PollWithViolation.title: Pollutant(s) With Violations (3 years)
PollWithViolation.description: The names of pollutants with effluent exceedances (i.e., violation code E90) in the past three years in ICIS-NPDES.

LimPollutant.title: Pollutants(s) With Limits
LimPollutant.description: The list of pollutants with enforceable (i.e., numeric limits or monitoring only) and/or benchmark limits in the current version of a NPDES permit.

DMRPounds.description: Total pounds of pollutants discharged by the NPDES ID for the most recent complete calendar year.

DMRTwpe.description: Total toxic-weighted pounds equivalent (TWPE) discharged by the NPDES ID for the most recent complete calendar year. TWPE is the mass of a pollutant or chemical discharged that accounts for its relative toxicity.

PastCalYrConvPollutants.title: DMR Conventional Pollutants Loadings (lb/year)
PastCalYrConvPollutants.description: Total pounds of conventional pollutants discharged by the NPDES ID for the most recent complete calendar year.

PastCalYrConvPolOvrLmt.title: DMR Conventional Pollutants - Load Over Limit (lb/year)
PastCalYrConvPolOvrLmt.description: Total load over limit of conventional pollutant pounds equivalent discharged by the NPDES ID for the most recent complete calendar year.

PastCalYrToxicPolOvrLmt.title: DMR Toxic Load Over Limit (lb-eq/year)
PastCalYrToxicPolOvrLmt.description: Total load over limit of toxic-weighted pounds equivalent (TWPE) discharged by the NPDES ID for the most recent complete calendar year.

FacTRISwRel.description: Chemical surface water release information from the Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) represents the total chemical releases discharged to surface water, in pounds, for the most recent reporting year.

FacTRIPotwTrans.description: POTW transfer information from the Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) represents the amount of toxic chemicals transferred to a Publicly Operated Treatment Works (POTW), in pounds, for the most recent reporting year.

CWPCsoFlag.title: Combined Sewer Overflows (CSOs)?
CWPCsoFlag.description: The discharge from a Combined Sewer System at a point prior to the treatment plant. CSOs are point sources subject to NPDES permit requirements including both technology-based and water quality-based requirements of the Clean Water Act.

CWPCsoOutfalls.title: CSO Outfalls
CWPCsoOutfalls.description: The number of discharge outfalls at points prior to the treatment plant.

CWPStateWaterBodyCode.description:
Code from the Assessment TMDL Tracking & Implementation System (ATTAINS) database, assigned by the US Geological Survey, used to classify watersheds in the United States and the Caribbean. The code consists of twelve digits which correspond to six levels of classification:
- Region (first-level, 2-digit HUC)
- Subregion (second-level, 4-digit HUC)
- Accounting unit (third-level, 6-digit HUC)
- Cataloguing unit (fourth-level, 8-digit HUC)
- Watershed (fifth-level, 10-digit HUC)
- Subwatershed (sixth-level, 12-digit HUC)

CWPStateWaterBodyName.description: The name of the watershed from the ATTAINS database in which the facility resides.

AttainsCycleYear.title: ATTAINS Cycle Year
AttainsCycleYear.description: The year in which the most recent state assessment occurred for the waterbody. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

RadGnisName.title: Reach Address Database GNIS Name
RadGnisName.description: The name of the waterbody from the Geographic Names Information System (GNIS) database in which the facility is permitted to discharge directly.

RadReachcode.title: Reach Address Database Reach Code
RadReachcode.description: A nationally unique and permanent identifier for the waterbody, assigned by the US Geological Survey.

RadWBDHu8.title: WBD Hydrologic Unit Code (RAD)
RadWBDHu8.description: Hydrologic Unit Code (HUC) from the Reach Address Database (RAD), which is derived from the USGS Watershed Boundary Dataset.

RadWBDHu8Name.title: WBD Hydrologic Unit Name (RAD)
RadWBDHu8Name.description: The name of the hydrologic unit in which the facility may discharge, from the Reach Address Database (RAD) and derived from the USGS Watershed Boundary Dataset.

FacDerivedWBDHu8.title: WBD Hydrologic Unit Code (FRS)
FacDerivedWBDHu8.description: Spatially derived HUC based on the facility's geographic coordinates in FRS.

FacDerivedWBDHu8Name.title: WBD Hydrologic Unit Name (FRS Derived)
FacDerivedWBDHu8Name.description: The name of the hydrologic unit in which the facility is located within, derived spatially based on the facility's geographic coordinates in FRS.

RadWBDHuc12.title: Reach Address Database Watershed Boundary Dataset HUC12 Code
RadWBDHuc12.description:
Code from the Reach Address Database (RAD), assigned by the US Geological Survey, used to classify watersheds in the United States and the Caribbean. The code consists of twelve digits which correspond to six levels of classification:
- Region (first-level, 2-digit HUC)
- Subregion (second-level, 4-digit HUC)
- Accounting unit (third-level, 6-digit HUC)
- Cataloguing unit (fourth-level, 8-digit HUC)
- Watershed (fifth-level, 10-digit HUC)
- Subwatershed (sixth-level, 12-digit HUC)

RadHu12Name.title: Reach Address Database HUC12 Name
RadHu12Name.description: The name of the waterbody in which the facility is permitted to discharge directly (from the Reach Address Database, RAD).

FacDerivedWBD.title: 12-Digit WBD HUC
FacDerivedWBD.description: The Hydrologic Unit Code (HUC-12) of the waterbody in which the facility resides, derived based on location data in FRS.

FacDerivedWBDName.title: FRS Derived Watershed Boundary Dataset (WBD) Name
FacDerivedWBDName.description: The 12 digit Watershed Boundary Dataset Name derived from the FRS Best Pick Coordinate

AttainsSource.title: ATTAINS Source
AttainsSource.description: The CWA Report in which the waterbody data can be found. The data are from the Assessment TMDL Tracking & Implementation System (ATTAINS) database.

CWPImpWaterFlg.title: Impaired Water Body
CWPImpWaterFlg.description: Displays "Y" if the permitted facility discharges directly into category 4 or 5 impaired waters, as designated under section 303(d) of the Clean Water Act.

AttainsImpWaterFlg.title: ATTAINS Impaired Water Flag
AttainsImpWaterFlg.description: Displays "Y" if the waterbody in which the facility resides is listed for impairment. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

AttainsAuCategory.title: ATTAINS Assessment Unit Category
AttainsAuCategory.description:
The impairment class or category of the waterbody in which the facility is permitted to discharge directly. The data are from the ATTAINS database:
- 5  = Impaired: TMDL needed. Available information indicates that at least one designated use is not being supported and a TMDL is needed (also known as the 303(d) listed waters).
- 4  = Impaired: TMDL not needed. Available information indicates that at least one designated use is not being supported, but a TMDL is not needed (see subcategories).
- 4a = TMDL completed. A TMDL has been completed, but impairment still exists.
- 4b = TMDL alternative. Impairment is being addressed by a method other than a TMDL (e.g., stream bank improvements).
- 4c = Non-pollutant causes. Cause of impairment is not a pollutant (e.g., habitat destruction).

AttainsStateCauses.title: ATTAINS State Causes
AttainsStateCauses.description: Lists all pollutants or stressors that are causing impairment in the assessed waterbody. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

AttainsCauseGroups.title: ATTAINS Cause Groups
AttainsCauseGroups.description: Lists all groups of pollutants or stressors that are causing impairment in the assessed waterbody. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

AttainsPossibleNPDESParams.title: ATTAINS Possible NPDES Parameters
AttainsPossibleNPDESParams.description: Lists all pollutants discharged by the facility that are potentially contributing to the impairment of local waterbodies.

AttainsAquaticLifeUseFlg.title: ATTAINS Aquatic Life Use Flag
AttainsAquaticLifeUseFlg.description: Displays "Y" if the waterbody in which the facility resides is designated for aquatic life use. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

AttainsExceptnlUseFlg.title: ATTAINS Exceptional Use Flag
AttainsExceptnlUseFlg.description: Displays "Y" if the waterbody in which the facility resides is designated for exceptional use. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

AttainsRecreationUseFlg.title: ATTAINS Recreational Use Flag
AttainsRecreationUseFlg.description: Displays "Y" if the waterbody in which the facility resides is designated for recreational use. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

AttainsShellfishUseFlg.title: ATTAINS Shellfish Use Flag
AttainsShellfishUseFlg.description: Displays "Y" if the waterbody in which the facility resides is designated for shellfish use. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

BeachCloseLastYearFlg.description: Displays "Y" if the facility is located on or near a waterbody with a beach closure within the last year.

BeachCloseLast2yrsFlg.description: Displays "Y" if the facility is located on or near a waterbody with a beach closure within the last two years.

ChesapeakeBayFlag.title: Chesapeake Bay Flag
ChesapeakeBayFlag.description: Displays "Y" if the facility is located within the Chesapeake Bay watershed.

EPASystem.title: EPA Data System
EPASystem.description:
The EPA data system in which permit and facility records are kept. EPA's Facility Registry System (FRS) links all program database records (such as permit IDs and IDs facilities use in reporting to EPA) together. The following list describes the individual data systems that are linked to from the detailed facility report: 

- AFS: Air Facility System for Clean Air Act stationary source programs.
- ICP: Integrated Compliance Information System for Clean Water Act programs monitoring National Pollutant Discharge Elimination System (NPDES) permits.
- RCR: Resource Conservation and Recovery Act Information System (RCRAInfo) for tracking the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act (RCRA) programs.
- NCDB: National Compliance Database System for monitoring national performance of the Toxic Substance Control Act (TSCA); the Emergency Planning and Right-to-Know Act, Section 313 (EPCRA); the Asbestos Hazard Emergency Response (AHERA); and the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act (FIFRA).
- TRI: Toxics Release Inventory for Emergency Planning and Community Right-to-Know Act, Section 313 submissions.
- NEI: National Emissions Inventory database contains information on stationary and mobile sources that emit criteria air pollutants and their precursors, as well as hazardous air pollutants (HAPs). The database includes estimates of annual emissions, by source, of air pollutants in each area of the country, on an annual basis.
- TSCA: Toxic Substances Control Act addressing the production, importation, use, and disposal of specific chemicals.

Statute.title: Regulatory Statute
Statute.description:
The name of the statute associated with each of the permits and identifiers linked to the facility: 
- CAA = the Clean Air Act
- CWA = the Clean Water Act
- RCRA = the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act
- EP313 = the Emergency Planning and Community Right-to-Know Act, Section 313 (also known as the Toxics Release Inventory Program)
- TSCA = the Toxic Substances Control Act
- SDWA = the Safe Drinking Water Act

CWPTRIbalLandCode.title: ICIS Tribal Land Code
CWPTRIbalLandCode.description: From ICIS, the unique identifier for every unit of land within Indian Country.

CWPPermitStatusCode.title: Permit Status (Code)
CWPPermitStatusCode.description: The code associated with the facility's NPDES permit status.

CWPPermitTypeCode.title: Permit Type (Code)
CWPPermitTypeCode.description: The code associated with the facility's NPDES permit classification.

CWPSNCEventDesc.description: Describes the event that resulted in the facility's status of Significant Noncompliance.

FacMapFlg.title: Facility Mapped Flag
FacMapFlg.description: Graphical indicator denoting whether geographical data required to map a facility are available.

FacMapIcon.title: Facility Map Icon
FacMapIcon.description: The default map icon image file calculated for the facility by the ECHO program.

CWPDateLastPenalty.description: Indicates date of most recent penalty against the facility.

FacTRIReporter.title: Facility TRI Reporter
FacTRIReporter.description: Indicates whether facility reported to the Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) for the most recent reporting year.

CWP13qtrsComplHistory.title: CWP 13 Quarters Compliance History
CWP13qtrsComplHistory.description:
The facility's 3-year or 13-quarter compliance status history by quarter (3-month period). Each character represents a quarter of compliance, going from oldest to most recent. Character values correspond to the following compliance statuses:
_ -No Violation Identified
V -Violation Identified
S -High Priority Violation
U - Undetermined

CWPCaseIDs.description: Indicates the ICIS Case Number, a unique number identifying the civil enforcement action.

CWPFIPSCode.title: CWP FIPS Code
CWPFIPSCode.description: A 5 digit combination of the 2 digit Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) code for the state and the 3 digit FIPS code of the county that a facility is located in.

DMRImpairedPoll.example: Mercury | Oil and grease | Solids, total suspended | Temperature, water deg. centigrade | Temperature, water deg. fahrenheit | pH
DMRImpairedPoll.description: The pollutants with limits or monitoring requirements in a facility's NPDES permit with the potential to contribute to impairment of local waterbodies

CurrSvFlag.title: Current Significant Violation Flag
CurrSvFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has a current significant violation. 1 = Yes

ViolFlag.title: Violation Flag
ViolFlag.description: Indicates if the facility had a violation within the last 3 years. 1 = Yes

CurrVioFlag.title: Current Violation Flag
CurrVioFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has a current violation. 1 = Yes

Insp5yrFlag.title: Inspected Within Last Five Years Flag
Insp5yrFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has an inspection within the last 5 years. 1 = Yes

Ea5yrFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has a formal enforcement action within the last 5 years. 1 = Yes

Infea5yrFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has an informal enforcement action within the last 5 years. 1 = Yes.

CWPTotalPenalties.description: The total penalty value incurred over 5 years.

TRIbalFlag.title: Tribal Lands Flag
TRIbalFlag.description: A flag indicating that the facility is within a tribal area.

CensusBlockGroup.title: Census Block Group
CensusBlockGroup.description: A geographic unit used by the United States Census Bureau, generally defined to contain between 600 and 3,000 people.

MaxPctileUs.description: The maximum percentile from all individual EJSCREEN indicators.

EjscreenFlag.title: EJ Screen Flag
EjscreenFlag.description: A Y/N indicator identifying whether or not the facility is within an Environmental Justice area.

LastDMRValueRcvdDate.title: Last DMR Value Received Date
LastDMRValueRcvdDate.description: The latest date that a Discharge Monitoring Report was received by the State or EPA.

Lower48.title: Contiguous United States Flag
Lower48.description: Flag showing Y/N whether location is within the contiguous (lower 48) United States.

ActiveLower48.description: A Y/N indicator indicating that the facility is active and located within the lower 48 contiguous US States.

EffExceeds.title: Effluent Exceedances
EffExceeds.description: The number of E90 Effluent Violations in the last 3 years.

PastCalYrAverageFlow.title: Past Calendar Year Average Flow
PastCalYrAverageFlow.description: The past calendar year average flow in Million Gallons a Day (MGD).

PastCalYrToxicPollutants.title: DMR Toxic Pollutants
PastCalYrToxicPollutants.description: The toxic pollutants discharged by the NPDES facility for the most recent complete calendar year.

CWPVioStatus.title: Current RNC Violation Status
CWPVioStatus.description: The current Reportable Non Compliance value for the facility.

IndswFlag.title: Industrial Stormwater Flag
IndswFlag.description: A value of Y indicates an Industrial Stormwater Permit.

CertifiedDate.title: Certified Date
CertifiedDate.description: The issue date or effective date of the permit.

ReferencePoint.title: Reference Point
ReferencePoint.example: ENTRANCE POINT OF A FACILITY OR STATION

CalculatedAccuracyMeters.title: Calculated Accuracy in Meters
CalculatedAccuracyMeters.description: The estimated accuracy in Meters for the facility's geospatial coordinate.

BiosolidsFlag.description: A Yes/No field to indicate permits with biosolids management and compliance information.

VioLastYear.title: Water Program Violation Flag
VioLastYear.description: A flag (values of 1 for Yes, 0 for No) that a Water Program Violation occurred in the last 4 quarters.

StateAuthNPDES.title: State Authorization NPDES Facilities
StateAuthNPDES.description: Indicates whether the state/tribe/territory code (first 2 digits of the NPDES_ID/SOURCE_ID) is authorized for NPDES Facilities.

StateAuthFedfac.title: State Authorization Federal Facilities
StateAuthFedfac.description: Indicates whether the state/tribe/territory code (first 2 digits of the NPDES_ID/SOURCE_ID) is authorized to regulate Federally owned facilities.

StateAuthPretreat.title: State Authorization Pretreatment Facilities
StateAuthPretreat.description: Indicates whether the state/tribe/territory code (first 2 digits of the NPDES_ID/SOURCE_ID) is authorized for Pretreatment Facilities.

StateAuthGen.title: State Authorization General Facilities
StateAuthGen.description: Indicates whether the state/tribe/territory code (first 2 digits of the NPDES_ID/SOURCE_ID) is authorized for General NPDES Facilities.

StateAuthBiosolids.title: State Authorization Biosolids
StateAuthBiosolids.description: Indicates whether the state/tribe/territory code (first 2 digits of the NPDES_ID/SOURCE_ID) is authorized for Biosolids.

NPDESDataGroups.title: NPDES Data Group Codes
NPDESDataGroups.description: This is the code indicating the NPDES eReporting Rule Data Group that applies to the data.

PermittingAgency.title: Permitting Agency
PermittingAgency.description: This is the type of organization issuing or granting a permit.

ElectrRptWaiverTypeCode.title: Electronic Reporting Waiver Type Code
ElectrRptWaiverTypeCode.description: The unique code that identifies whether the authorized NPDES program has granted the permittee a waiver from electronic reporting in compliance with this part (e.g,  temporary waiver, permanent waiver). This data element should be left blank if the permittee does not have a waiver from electronic reporting in compliance with this part.

ElectrRptWaiverTypeDesc.title: Electronic Waiver Type Code Description
ElectrRptWaiverTypeDesc.description: Description of the unique code that identifies whether the authorized NPDES program has granted the permittee a waiver from electronic reporting in compliance with this part (e.g,  temporary waiver, permanent waiver). This data element should be left blank if the permittee does not have a waiver from electronic reporting in compliance with this part.

ElectrRptWaiverEffDate.title: Electronic Reporting Waiver Effective Date
ElectrRptWaiverEffDate.description: This is the effective date for a  waiver from electronic reporting in compliance with this part. This data element should always be populated for a waiver.

ElectrRptWaiverExpDate.title: Electronic Reporting Waiver Expiration Date
ElectrRptWaiverExpDate.description: This is the expiration date for a temporary waiver from electronic reporting in compliance with this part. This data element should be left blank if the permittee has a permanent waiver from electronic reporting or if the permittee does not have a waiver from electronic reporting in compliance with this part.

ElectrSubmissionTypeCode.title: Electronic Submission Type Code
ElectrSubmissionTypeCode.description: This is the code indicating the means by which the data were submitted electronically.

ElectrSubmissionTypeDesc.title: Electronic Submission Type Code Description
ElectrSubmissionTypeDesc.description: This is the description of the code indicating the means by which the data were submitted electronically.

WebDocs.title: Web Documents
WebDocs.description: Contains flags that identify what web accessible documents are available for the facility.

E90Exceeds5yr.title: E90 Exceedences 5 Years
E90Exceeds5yr.description: The number of E90 Exceedences in the last 5 years.

E90Exceeds4yr.title: E90 Exceedences 4 Years
E90Exceeds4yr.description: The number of E90 Exceedences in the last 4 years.

E90Exceeds3yr.title: E90 Exceedences 3 Years
E90Exceeds3yr.description: The number of E90 Exceedences in the last 3 years.

E90Exceeds2yr.title: E90 Exceedences 2 Years
E90Exceeds2yr.description: The number of E90 Exceedences in the last 2 years.

E90Exceeds1yr.title: E90 Exceedences 1 Year
E90Exceeds1yr.description: The number of E90 Exceedences in the last year.

E90Pollutants5yr.title: E90 Pollutants 5 Years
E90Pollutants5yr.description: The pollutants for the E90 Exceedences in the last 5 years.

E90Pollutants4yr.title: E90 Pollutants 4 Years
E90Pollutants4yr.description: The pollutants for the E90 Exceedences in the last 4 years.

E90Pollutants3yr.title: E90 Pollutants 3 Years
E90Pollutants3yr.description: The pollutants for the E90 Exceedences in the last 3 years.

E90Pollutants2yr.title: E90 Pollutants 2 Years
E90Pollutants2yr.description: The pollutants for the E90 Exceedences in the last 2 years.

E90Pollutants1yr.title: E90 Pollutants 1 Year
E90Pollutants1yr.description: The pollutants for the E90 Exceedences in the last year.

FacCountyName.title: FRS Facility County Name
FacCountyName.description: The facility county name from EPA's Facility Registry System

FacStdCountyName.title: FRS Standardized Facility County Name
FacStdCountyName.description: The standardized  facility county name from EPA's Facility Registry System

MaxScore.title: Max Score
MaxScore.description: A sorting score for internal use.

LAT.title: Latitude
LAT.description: The latitude of the facility in degrees, to four decimal places

LON.title: Longitude
LON.description: The longitude of the facility in degrees, to four decimal places

ICON.title: Icon
ICON.description: Name of each individual icon file within the URL base

TYPE.title: Type
TYPE.description: For DFR, this is always facility

NAME.title: Name
NAME.description: For DFR, this is the Facility name. The name corresponds to the TYPE value

PUV.title: Popup Value
PUV.description: Pop up value. Combine with PopUpBaseURL to give the popup for the facility

CWAstatus.description: Quarterly compliance status for the most recent 13 quarters. Each letter indicates the compliance status for the corresponding quarter.

LastInsp.title: Last Inspection
LastInsp.description: The unique identifier for the last inspection

FormalCount.title: Formal Count
FormalCount.description: The number of formal enforcement actions that have been taken against the facility

InformalCount.title: Informal Count
InformalCount.description: The number of informal enforcement actions that have been taken against the facility

QueryID.title: Query Identifier
QueryID.description: Sequential number assigned to entire search result

IconBaseURL.title: Icon Base URL
IconBaseURL.description: URL where all the icons are located

PopUpBaseURL.title: Popup Base URL
PopUpBaseURL.description: Combine this URL with the PUC to get popup info

MapData.title: Map Data
MapData.description: An array of facility geospatial information.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Field to record messages (typically performance-related) about packet processing

Version.title: Version
Version.description: Version of the SDWA system service

IndianCountryRows.title: Indian Country Row Count
IndianCountryRows.description: Number of facilities with tribal_flag populated

SVRows.title: Significant Violation Result Count
SVRows.description: Number of facilities with curr_sv_flag populated (CWP_STATUS = "Significant Violation")

CVRows.description: Summary count of the number of CWA facilities or SDWA public drinking water systems with current violations.

V3Rows.description: Number of facilities having one or more quarters in non-compliance (QNC) in the last three years

FEARows.description: Summary count of the number of facilities with a formal enforcement action in the past five years

InfFEARows.description: Number of facilities with infea_5yr_flag populated (INFORMAL_ENF_ACT_COUNT > 0)

INSPRows.description: Number of facilities with insp_5yr_flag populated (CWP_DATE_LAST_INSPECTION)

BioCVRows.description: Number of facilities with current biosolid-related violations.

BioV3Rows.description: Number of facilities having one or more quarters of biosolid-related non-compliance in the last three years.

VioLast4QRows.title: Facilities in Violation in the Last Year
VioLast4QRows.description: The number of facilities with a violation in the last year.

TotalPenalties.title: Total Penalties
TotalPenalties.description: The total dollar amount of either assessed or final penalties within the five year time period

BadSystemIDs.description: Identifies which passed query system identifiers are invalid.

QueryID.title: Query Identifier
QueryID.description: Sequential number assigned to entire search result

PageNo.title: Page Number
PageNo.description: The number of pages of results returned

Facilities.title: Facilities
Facilities.description: A complex array of facility information.

ObjectId.title: Object Identifier
ObjectId.description: Sequential number assigned to each facility or cluster returned.

ClusterLatitude.title: Cluster Latitude
ClusterLatitude.description: The latitude in decimal degrees expressed using the NAD83 horizontal datum.

ClusterLongitude.title: Cluster Longitude
ClusterLongitude.description: The longitude in decimal degrees expressed using the NAD83 horizontal datum.

ClusterIcon.title: Cluster Icon
ClusterIcon.description: The icon file used to reprsent the cluster.

ClusterType.title: Cluster Type
ClusterType.description: The representative geographic area used for clustering.  Examples:  State, County, Zip Code

ClusterName.title: Cluster Name
ClusterName.description: THe name or the identifier of the geographic area used for clustering.  Examples:  Alaska, Fairfax County, 22314

ClusterValue.title: Cluster Value
ClusterValue.description: The value, internal to the database report object, that represents this cluster, like a state abbreviation, zip code, or county FIPS code.  Examples: AK, 22314, 50011

ClusterCount.title: Cluster Count
ClusterCount.description: The number of facilities or cases in the cluster.

IndianCountryRows.title: Indian Country Row Count
IndianCountryRows.description: Number of facilities with tribal_flag populated

EPARegionCode.title: EPA Region Code
EPARegionCode.description: The EPA region where the facility is located. EPA has 10 regional offices that execute programs within several states and territories

SVRows.title: Significant Violation Result Count
SVRows.description: Number of facilities with curr_sv_flag populated (CWP_STATUS = "Significant Violation")

CVRows.description: Summary count of the number of CWA facilities or SDWA public drinking water systems with current violations.

V3Rows.description: Number of facilities having one or more quarters in non-compliance (QNC) in the last three years

FEARows.description: Summary count of the number of facilities with a formal enforcement action in the past five years

InfFEARows.description: Number of facilities with infea_5yr_flag populated (INFORMAL_ENF_ACT_COUNT > 0)

INSPRows.description: Number of facilities with insp_5yr_flag populated (CWP_DATE_LAST_INSPECTION)

BioCVRows.description: Number of facilities with current biosolid-related violations.

BioV3Rows.description: Number of facilities having one or more quarters of biosolid-related non-compliance in the last three years.

VioLast4QRows.title: Facilities in Violation in the Last Year
VioLast4QRows.description: The number of facilities with a violation in the last year.

TotalPenalties.title: Total Penalties
TotalPenalties.description: The total dollar amount of either assessed or final penalties within the five year time period

ClusterData.title: Cluster Data
ClusterData.description: An array of state, county, or zip code cluster information

ObjectId.title: Object Identifier
ObjectId.description: Sequential number assigned to each facility or cluster returned.

CWPName.title: Facility Name
CWPName.description: Facility or permit holder name, as maintained in ICIS-NPDES.

CWPCity.title: City
CWPCity.description: City in which the facility is located.

CWPStateDistrict.description: The State Congressional District the facility is located within.

MasterExternalPermitNmbr.title: Master External Permit Number
MasterExternalPermitNmbr.description: This is the unique identifier for the Master General Permit for a General Permit Covered Facility.

RegistryID.title: FRS ID
RegistryID.description: An internal 12-digit Facility Registry Service (FRS) tracking number used to tie all facility data together in EPA regulatory program databases.

CWPCounty.title: County
CWPCounty.description: County in which the facility is located.

CWPEPARegion.title: EPA Region
CWPEPARegion.description: The EPA region where the facility is located. EPA has 10 regional offices that execute programs within several states and territories.

FacFederalAgencyCode.title: Facility Federal Agency Code
FacFederalAgencyCode.description: Indicates the federal agency, as classified in FRS. Federal agencies are installations that are owned and operated by the U.S. government. The five-character code consists of a letter followed by four numbers. There are four possible letters that can occupy the first character position: C = Civilian Federal Agency; D = Department of Defense; E = Department of Energy; X = Unknown. The second and third characters represent the agency code, while the fourth and fifth characters represent the bureau code.

FacFederalAgencyName.title: Federal Agency Name
FacFederalAgencyName.description: Indicates the name of the federal agency, as classified in FRS. Federal agencies are installations that are owned and operated by the U.S. government.

FacDerivedHuc.title: Watershed (HUC Code)
FacDerivedHuc.description: The 8-digit Hydrologic Unit Code (HUC) of the watershed in which the facility resides. A HUC number is assigned to every watershed in the nation and uniquely identifies the watershed.

FacFIPSCode.title: FIPS Code
FacFIPSCode.description: The 2-digit Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) code to identify the county that a facility is located in.

FacIndianCntryFlg.title: Facility Indian Country Flag
FacIndianCntryFlg.description: Flag showing Y/N whether the facility is located in Indian Country.

CWPIndianCntryFlg.title: In Indian Country
CWPIndianCntryFlg.description: Displays "Y" if a facility is located in Indian country.

FacIndianSpatialFlg.title: Indian Spatial Flag
FacIndianSpatialFlg.description: Returns “Y” if a facility is located within a tribal spatial boundary as defined by the U.S. Census Bureau 2010 tribal boundary layer data for tribes in the lower 48 states and Bureau of Land Management Alaska State Office data for native villages in Alaska. Returns “N” if a facility is not located within a tribal or native Alaskan village area.

FacDerivedTRIbes.title: FRS Spatially Derived Tribe
FacDerivedTRIbes.description: The tribes or tribal territories located within 25 miles of the facility's location.

FacUsMexBorderFlg.title: Near US-Mexico Border
FacUsMexBorderFlg.description: A Y/N flag indicating that the facility is within 100KM of the US-Mexico Border.

CWPSICCodes.title: SIC Code
CWPSICCodes.description: Indicates the facility's or permit's primary Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) Code.

CWPNAICSCodes.title: NAICS Code
CWPNAICSCodes.description: Indicates the facility's or permit's primary North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) Code.

FacLat.title: Latitude
FacLat.description: The latitude of the facility in decimal degrees expressed using the NAD83 horizontal datum. The coordinate comes from the FRS EPA Locational Reference Tables (LRT) file which represents the most accurate value for the facility based on the available spatial metadata.

FacLong.title: Longitude
FacLong.description: The longitude of the facility in decimal degrees expressed using the NAD83 horizontal datum. The coordinate comes from the FRS EPA Locational Reference Tables (LRT) file which represents the most accurate value for the facility based on the available spatial metadata.

CWPTotalDesignFlowNmbr.description: The amount of wastewater flow in million gallons per day (MGD) that the facility is designed for.

CWPActualAverageFlowNmbr.description: The actual amount of the facility's wastewater flow measured in million gallons per day (MGD).

CWPFacilityTypeIndicator.title: Facility Type
CWPFacilityTypeIndicator.description: Each National Pollutant Discharge Elimination System (NPDES) permit is defined by the program office as a Major or non-major discharger. This field also indicates the permit type.

DschToMs4.title: Discharging to MS4
DschToMs4.description: Indicatesif a facility discharges into a Municipal Separate Storm Sewer System (MS4).

ReceivingMs4Name.title: Receiving MS4 Name
ReceivingMs4Name.description: This is the name of the receiving MS4(s).

StormWaterArea.title: Est. Area Exposed to Stormwater (Acres)
StormWaterArea.description: The estimated area of industrial activity at the site exposed to stormwater in acres.

HistoricCriterionCode.title: Historic Preservation Criterion
HistoricCriterionCode.description: Indicates the eligibility criteria for historic properties preservation.

SpeciesCriticalHabitalFlag.description: This identifies if Endangered Species Act (ESA) provisions are met.

SwpppUrl.description: Web address URL of Internet page where current copy of Stormwater Pollution Prevention Plan (SWPPP) is maintained.

ExposedActivity.description: Description of onsite industrial activities exposed to stormwater and potential spill and leak areas.

AssociatedPollutant.description: Description of pollutant(s) or pollutant constituent(s) associated with each industrial activity exposed to stormwater.

ControlMeasure.title: Control Measure
ControlMeasure.description: Description of control measures employed to comply with the non-numeric technology-based effluent limits required in Part 2.1.2 and Part 8.

ControlMeasureSchedule.title: Control Measure Schedule
ControlMeasureSchedule.description: Description of schedule for control measures associated with good housekeeping and maintenance.

TypeOfMonitoring.title: Type Of Monitoring
TypeOfMonitoring.description: The type of monitoring specified in the SWPPP.

TypeOfWater.title: Type Of Water
TypeOfWater.description: The type of water body receiving discharges stormwater discharges specified in the SWPPP.

EjscreenFlagUs.title: EJ Screen Flag (US)
EjscreenFlagUs.description: A Y/N indicator identifying whether or not the facility is within an Environmental Justice area.

Over80CountUs.title: EJ Indexes Above 80th Percentile
Over80CountUs.description: The number of primary EJSCREEN environmental justice (EJ) indexes exceeding the 80th or higher national percentile for the Census block group that the facility is located in.

PctilePctpre1960Us.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN Lead paint indicator.

PctileDpmUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN diesel particulate matter indicator.

PctileCancerUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN NATA air toxics cancer risk indicator.

PctileRespUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN NATA respiratory hazard index indicator.

PctileTrafficScoreUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN Traffic proximity and volume indicator.

PctileProximityNPDESUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN proximity to major direct water dischargers indicator.

PctileProximityNplUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN proximity to National Priorities List (NPL) sites indicator.

PctileProximityRmpUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN proximity to Risk Management Plan (RMP) sites indicator.

PctileProximityTsdfUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN proximity to Treatment Storage and Disposal Facilities (TSDFs) indicator.

PctileO3Us.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN ozone indicator.

PctilePmUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN particulate matter indicator.

FacPopDen.title: Facility Population Density
FacPopDen.description: The number of persons per square mile in the area being profiled. This field is the ratio of total persons (displayed in the Total Persons field) to total land area (displayed in the Land Area field).

FacPercentMinority.title: Facility Percent Minority
FacPercentMinority.description: Percent Minority is the percentage of the population of the given area that is considered minority. Statistics are shown for the area within a 3-mile radius of each facility.

Sector.title: Sector
Sector.description: The sector code and description for the industrial stormwater facility.

Subsector.title: Subsector
Subsector.description: The industrial subsector associated with the facility.

CWPVersionNmbr.title: Permit Version Number
CWPVersionNmbr.description: The version number of the facility's NPDES permit.

CWPPermitStatusDesc.title: Permit Status Description
CWPPermitStatusDesc.description: The current stage/status in the NPDES permit life cycle.

IssuingAgency.title: Permit Issuing Agency
IssuingAgency.description: This is the name of the organization issuing or granting a permit.

SubmittedDate.title: Submitted Date
SubmittedDate.description: Date that the permit was submitted to the issuing agency.

CWPPermitTypeDesc.title: Permit Type Description
CWPPermitTypeDesc.description:
NPDES facility permit classification:
- NPDES Individual Permit
- General Permit Covered Facility
- NPDES Master General Permit
- Associated Permit Record
- Individual Industrial User Permit
- Individual State Issued Permit
- State Issued Master General Permit
- Unpermitted Facility

CWPIssueDate.title: Permit Issue Date
CWPIssueDate.description: Date (MM/DD/YYYY) that the permit was issued.

CWPEffectiveDate.title: Permit Effective Date
CWPEffectiveDate.description: Date (MM/DD/YYYY) that the permit became effective.

CWPTerminationDate.title: Permit Termination Date
CWPTerminationDate.description: Date (MM/DD/YYYY) that the permit was terminated.

CWPMajorMinorStatusFlag.title: Major/Minor Status Flag
CWPMajorMinorStatusFlag.description:
Facilities marked "M" for major refers to CWA major permittees.
- M = Major
- N = Minor

PermitComponents.title: Permit Components
PermitComponents.description: Indicates the permit component(s) associated with the NPDES Permit Program Area.

NPDESDataGroupsDescs.title: NPDES Data Group Codes Descriptions
NPDESDataGroupsDescs.description: Description for each NPDES Data Group eReporting rule code related to the current NPDES permit.

MsgpLastReportYear.title: MSGP Latest Annual Report Year
MsgpLastReportYear.description: The calendar year of the latest MSGP annual report submitted by the permitted facility.

MsgpFacilityInspctnSmmry.title: MSGP Facility Inspection Summary
MsgpFacilityInspctnSmmry.description: Summary of the quarterly facility inspection documentation (part 3.1 of the permit) during the MSGP annual report year.

MsgpVisualAssessmentSmmry.title: MSGP Visual Assessment Summary
MsgpVisualAssessmentSmmry.description: Summary of the quarterly visual assessment documentation (part 3.3 of the permit) during the MSGP annual report year.

MsgpNoFurtherRdctnRtnle.title: MsgpNoFurtherRdctnRtnle
MsgpNoFurtherRdctnRtnle.description: Description of rationale for why no further reductions are achievable (part 6.2.1.2 of the permit) during the MSGP annual report year.

MsgpCorrectiveActionSmmry.title: MSGP Corrective Action Summary
MsgpCorrectiveActionSmmry.description: Summary of the corrective action documentation (part 4.3 of the permit) during the MSGP annual report year.

NPDESIDs.title: ICS-NPDES Clean Water Act Identifier
NPDESIDs.description: Clean Water Act ID from the ICIS-NPDES (Integrated Compliance Information System - National Pollutant Discharge Elimination System)

RCRAIDs.title: Resource Conservation and Recovery Act IDs
RCRAIDs.description: A unique 12-character ID assigned for each record/permit/site/facility within the RCRAInfo database.

SDWAIDs.description: A unique 9-character ID assigned for each public water system within the Safe Drinking Water Information System (SDWIS).

TRIIDs.title: Toxics Release Inventory Program IDs
TRIIDs.description: A unique 15-character ID assigned for each facility within the Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) program. The format is ZZZZZNNNNNSSSSS, where ZZZZZ = ZIP code, NNNNN = the first 5 consonants of the name, and SSSSS = the first 5 non-blank non-special characters in the street address.

RmpIDs.title: RMP IDs
RmpIDs.description: A unique ID assigned to each facility submitting a Risk Management Plan to EPA under the Risk Management Plan Rule.

BioVioLastYearFlag.title: Biosolids Violation in Last Year
BioVioLastYearFlag.description: Y if the facility has a biosolids single event violation under the Clean Water Act in the last year. Note: Violations reported on the 2016 and 2017 Biosolids Annual Report are not updated with the weekly data refresh and may not be representative of a facility's recently submitted or updated report.

BioQtrsWithVio.title: Quarters with Violation for Biosolids (3 years)
BioQtrsWithVio.description: Count of the number of quarters, out of the last twelve quarters, in which the permit or site is considered with violations for biosolids.

CWPStatus.title: Current Compliance Status
CWPStatus.description:
An indication of the facility's current compliance status under the Clean Water Act:
- Significant Violation
- Noncompliance
- No Violation
- Unknown

CWPSNCStatus.title: Significant Noncompliance (SNC) Status
CWPSNCStatus.description: Indicates when a major source is in significant noncompliance (SNC) or a non-major source has a Category I violation.

CWPSNCStatusDate.title: SNC Status Date
CWPSNCStatusDate.description: The status date of the facility's Significant Noncompliance designation.

CWPQtrsWithNC.title: Quarters with Noncompliance (3 years)
CWPQtrsWithNC.description: Count of the number of quarters, out of the last twelve quarters, in which the permit or site is considered either with violations, in noncompliance (NC) status, or in Significant Noncompliance (SNC), as described above under Compliance Status.

CWPViolStatus.title: Current Violation Status
CWPViolStatus.description: Indicates if the facility is currently in any violation under the Clean Water Act, either in Noncompliance or Significant Noncompliance.

CWPQtrsWithSNC.title: Quarters with SNC (3 years)
CWPQtrsWithSNC.description: Count of the number of quarters, out of the last twelve quarters, in which the permit is considered in Significant Noncompliance (SNC), as described above under Compliance Status.

MissDMRQtrs.title: Qtrs in Undetermined Compliance Status (2 years)
MissDMRQtrs.description: Count of the number of quarters, out of the last twelve quarters, in which EPA's data system was not able to determine the facility-level compliance status.

CWPE90Cnt.title: Effluent Violations (5 yrs)
CWPE90Cnt.description: Displays the number of instances where effluent limits have been exceeded in the past 3 years (E90 compliance code), based on monthly Discharge Monitoring Reports (DMRs) submitted by facilities.

CWPComplianceTracking.description: Extent to which data is being entered and effluent exceedances are being identified (Off, On, Partial).

BioReportYear.description: The calendar year corresponding to the Annual Biosolids Report.

CWPInspectionCount.title: Inspections (5 yrs)
CWPInspectionCount.description: The number of inspections/compliance evaluations, under the corresponding statute, occurring at the facility within the last five years.

CWPDaysLastInspection.description: Indicates the number of days since the most recent inspection of the facility.

CWPDateLastInspection.title: Date of Last Inspection
CWPDateLastInspection.description: The date on which the most recent inspection of the facility took place. For the CAA, the date on which a Full Compliance Evaluation (FCE) was completed.

CWPDateLastInspEPA.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent inspection taken against the facility.

CWPDateLastInspSt.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent inspection taken against the facility by a state environmental agency.

CWPBioInspCount.description: The count of Biosolids related Inspections that have occured for the facility.

CWPDaysLastBioInsp.description: Indicates the number of days since the most recent Biosolids related inspection of the facility.

CWPDateLastBioInsp.title: Date of Last Biosolids Inspection
CWPDateLastBioInsp.description: The date on which the most recent biosolids program inspection of the facility took place.

CWPDateLastBioInspEPA.title: Date of Last Biosolids Inspection (EPA)
CWPDateLastBioInspEPA.description: Indicate the last inspection date by EPA

CWPDateLastBioInspSt.title: Date of Last Biosolids Inspection (State)
CWPDateLastBioInspSt.description: Indicate the last inspection date by state environmental agency

CWPInformalEnfActCount.title: Information Enforcement Actions (5 yrs)
CWPInformalEnfActCount.description: Indicates the total number of informal enforcement actions/notices of violations (NOVs) taken against the facility within the last five years.

CWPFormalEaCnt.description: Indicates the total number of enforcement actions taken against the facility within the last five years. "NA" indicates that this measure is not applicable for facilities with no associated CAA, CWA, or RCRA permits.

CWPDateLastInformalEa.title: Date of Last Informal Enf Action
CWPDateLastInformalEa.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed informal enforcement action taken against the facility.

CWPDateLastIeaEPA.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed informal enforcement action taken against the facility by EPA.

CWPDateLastIeaSt.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed informal enforcement action taken against the facility by a state environmental agency.

CWPDateLastFea.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed formal enforcement action taken against the facility.

CWPDateLastFeaEPA.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed formal enforcement action taken against the facility by EPA.

CWPDateLastFeaSt.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed formal enforcement action taken against the facility by a state environmental agency.

CWPBioIeaCount.description: The count of Biosolids related Informal Enforcement Actions that have been taken against the Facility.

CWPBioFeaCount.description: The count of Biosolids related Formal Enforcement Actions that have been taken against the Facility.

CWPDateLastBioIea.title: Date Last Biosolids Informal Action
CWPDateLastBioIea.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed biosolids informal enforcement action taken against the facility within the last five years.

CWPDateLastBioIeaEPA.title: Date Last  Biosolids Informal Action (EPA)
CWPDateLastBioIeaEPA.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed biosolids informal enforcement action taken against the facility by EPA within the last five years.

CWPDateLastBioIeaSt.title: Date Last Biosolids Informal Action (State)
CWPDateLastBioIeaSt.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed biosolids informal enforcement action taken against the facility by a state environmental agency within the last five years.

CWPDateLastBioFea.title: Date Last Biosolids Formal Action
CWPDateLastBioFea.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed biosolids formal enforcement action taken against the facility within the last five years.

CWPDateLastBioFeaEPA.title: Date Last Biosolids Formal Action (EPA)
CWPDateLastBioFeaEPA.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed formal enforcement action taken against the facility by EPA within the last five years.

CWPDateLastBioFeaSt.title: Date Last Biosolids Formal Action (State)
CWPDateLastBioFeaSt.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed formal enforcement action taken against the facility by a state environmental agency within the last five years.

CWPBioPenalties.description: The total amount of Biosolids related penalties that have been assessed against the facility.

CWPDateLastBioPenalty.title: Date of Last Biosolids Penalty
CWPDateLastBioPenalty.description: Indicates the date on which the most recent assessed (or final) biosolids penalty was taken against the facility within the last five years. This measure only includes penalties that have been entered in the program database ICIS-NPDES.

BioReportYears.title: Biosolids Annual Report
BioReportYears.description: Reporting years are determined by the year of the reporting period end date. Data reflect the last two reporting years.

BioTotalVolumeAmt.description: The amount (in dry metric tons) of biosolids or sewage sludge generated at the facility.

BioTotalVolumeAmt2016.description: The amount (in dry metric tons) of biosolids or sewage sludge generated at the facility.

BioLandApplicationSum.description: The amount (dry metric tons) of biosolids land applied.

BioLandApplicationSum2016.description: The amount (dry metric tons) of biosolids land applied.

BioSurfaceDispSum.description: The amount of surface disposal in dry metric tons (DMT).

BioSurfaceDispSum2016.description: The amount of surface disposal in dry metric tons (DMT).

BioIncinerationSum.description: The amount (dry metric tons) of biosolids incinerated.

BioIncinerationSum2016.description: The amount (dry metric tons) of biosolids incinerated.

BioOtherManagementSum.description: The amount (dry metric tons) of biosolids managed using methods not previously described.

BioOtherManagementSum2016.description: The amount (dry metric tons) of biosolids managed using methods not previously described.

BioTrtmntProcesses.description: Identifies the biosolids or sewage sludge treatment process or processes at the facility.

BioTrtmntProcesses2016.description: Identifies the biosolids or sewage sludge treatment process or processes at the facility.

BioTrtmntPrcssCmmntTxts.description: Free text additional description of "other" biotreatment processes.

BioTrmntPrcssCmntTxts2016.description: Free text additional description of "other" biotreatment processes.

BioAnalyMethodCatgrys.description: Displays the categories of the analytic methods used by the facility to analyze regulated parameters at the facility.

BioAnalyMethodCatgrys2016.description: Displays the categories of the analytic methods used by the facility to analyze regulated parameters at the facility.

BioAnalyMethods.description: Displays the analytic methods used by the facility to analyze enteric viruses, fecal coliforms, helminth ova, Salmonella sp., and other regulated parameters as reported on the Biosolids Program Report.

BioAnalyMethods2016.description: Displays the analytic methods used by the facility to analyze enteric viruses, fecal coliforms, helminth ova, Salmonella sp., and other regulated parameters as reported on the Biosolids Program Report.

BioMgmtPrctceTypes.description: The type of biosolids or sewage sludge management practice (e.g., land application, surface disposal, incineration) used by the facility.

BioMgmtPrctceTypes2016.description: The type of biosolids or sewage sludge management practice (e.g., land application, surface disposal, incineration) used by the facility.

BioOtherMgmtPrctcTxts.description: Free text additional description of "other" Biosolids Management Practices.

BioOtherMgmtPrctcTxts2016.description: Free text additional description of "other" Biosolids Management Practices.

BioMgmtPrctceStypes.description: Additional detail about the type of Management Practice used for an amount of Biosolids or Sewage Sludge.

BioMgmtPrctceStypes2016.description: Additional detail about the type of Management Practice used for an amount of Biosolids or Sewage Sludge.

BioMgmtHandlers.description: Indicates the type of Biosolids or Sewage Sludge handlers/preparers, either owner/operator or off-site third-party handler/preparer.

BioMgmtHandlers2016.description: Indicates the type of Biosolids or Sewage Sludge handlers/preparers, either owner/operator or off-site third-party handler/preparer.

PollWithViolation.title: Pollutant(s) With Violations (3 years)
PollWithViolation.description: The names of pollutants with effluent exceedances (i.e., violation code E90) in the past three years in ICIS-NPDES.

LimPollutant.title: Pollutants(s) With Limits
LimPollutant.description: The list of pollutants with enforceable (i.e., numeric limits or monitoring only) and/or benchmark limits in the current version of a NPDES permit.

DMRPounds.description: Total pounds of pollutants discharged by the NPDES ID for the most recent complete calendar year.

DMRTwpe.description: Total toxic-weighted pounds equivalent (TWPE) discharged by the NPDES ID for the most recent complete calendar year. TWPE is the mass of a pollutant or chemical discharged that accounts for its relative toxicity.

PastCalYrConvPollutants.title: DMR Conventional Pollutants Loadings (lb/year)
PastCalYrConvPollutants.description: Total pounds of conventional pollutants discharged by the NPDES ID for the most recent complete calendar year.

PastCalYrToxicPolOvrLmt.title: DMR Toxic Load Over Limit (lb-eq/year)
PastCalYrToxicPolOvrLmt.description: Total load over limit of toxic-weighted pounds equivalent (TWPE) discharged by the NPDES ID for the most recent complete calendar year.

PastCalYrConvPolOvrLmt.title: DMR Conventional Pollutants - Load Over Limit (lb/year)
PastCalYrConvPolOvrLmt.description: Total load over limit of conventional pollutant pounds equivalent discharged by the NPDES ID for the most recent complete calendar year.

FacTRISwRel.description: Chemical surface water release information from the Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) represents the total chemical releases discharged to surface water, in pounds, for the most recent reporting year.

FacTRIPotwTrans.description: POTW transfer information from the Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) represents the amount of toxic chemicals transferred to a Publicly Operated Treatment Works (POTW), in pounds, for the most recent reporting year.

CWPCsoFlag.title: Combined Sewer Overflows (CSOs)?
CWPCsoFlag.description: The discharge from a Combined Sewer System at a point prior to the treatment plant. CSOs are point sources subject to NPDES permit requirements including both technology-based and water quality-based requirements of the Clean Water Act.

CWPCsoOutfalls.title: CSO Outfalls
CWPCsoOutfalls.description: The number of discharge outfalls at points prior to the treatment plant.

CWPStateWaterBodyCode.description:
Code from the Assessment TMDL Tracking & Implementation System (ATTAINS) database, assigned by the US Geological Survey, used to classify watersheds in the United States and the Caribbean. The code consists of twelve digits which correspond to six levels of classification:
- Region (first-level, 2-digit HUC)
- Subregion (second-level, 4-digit HUC)
- Accounting unit (third-level, 6-digit HUC)
- Cataloguing unit (fourth-level, 8-digit HUC)
- Watershed (fifth-level, 10-digit HUC)
- Subwatershed (sixth-level, 12-digit HUC)

CWPStateWaterBodyName.description: The name of the watershed from the ATTAINS database in which the facility resides.

AttainsCycleYear.title: ATTAINS Cycle Year
AttainsCycleYear.description: The year in which the most recent state assessment occurred for the waterbody. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

RadGnisName.title: Reach Address Database GNIS Name
RadGnisName.description: The name of the waterbody from the Geographic Names Information System (GNIS) database in which the facility is permitted to discharge directly.

RadReachcode.title: Reach Address Database Reach Code
RadReachcode.description: A nationally unique and permanent identifier for the waterbody, assigned by the US Geological Survey.

RadWBDHu8.title: WBD Hydrologic Unit Code (RAD)
RadWBDHu8.description: Hydrologic Unit Code (HUC) from the Reach Address Database (RAD), which is derived from the USGS Watershed Boundary Dataset.

RadWBDHu8Name.title: WBD Hydrologic Unit Name (RAD)
RadWBDHu8Name.description: The name of the hydrologic unit in which the facility may discharge, from the Reach Address Database (RAD) and derived from the USGS Watershed Boundary Dataset.

FacDerivedWBDHu8.title: WBD Hydrologic Unit Code (FRS)
FacDerivedWBDHu8.description: Spatially derived HUC based on the facility's geographic coordinates in FRS.

FacDerivedWBDHu8Name.title: WBD Hydrologic Unit Name (FRS Derived)
FacDerivedWBDHu8Name.description: The name of the hydrologic unit in which the facility is located within, derived spatially based on the facility's geographic coordinates in FRS.

RadWBDHuc12.title: Reach Address Database Watershed Boundary Dataset HUC12 Code
RadWBDHuc12.description:
Code from the Reach Address Database (RAD), assigned by the US Geological Survey, used to classify watersheds in the United States and the Caribbean. The code consists of twelve digits which correspond to six levels of classification:
- Region (first-level, 2-digit HUC)
- Subregion (second-level, 4-digit HUC)
- Accounting unit (third-level, 6-digit HUC)
- Cataloguing unit (fourth-level, 8-digit HUC)
- Watershed (fifth-level, 10-digit HUC)
- Subwatershed (sixth-level, 12-digit HUC)

RadHu12Name.title: Reach Address Database HUC12 Name
RadHu12Name.description: The name of the waterbody in which the facility is permitted to discharge directly (from the Reach Address Database, RAD).

FacDerivedWBD.title: 12-Digit WBD HUC
FacDerivedWBD.description: The Hydrologic Unit Code (HUC-12) of the waterbody in which the facility resides, derived based on location data in FRS.

FacDerivedWBDName.title: FRS Derived Watershed Boundary Dataset (WBD) Name
FacDerivedWBDName.description: The 12 digit Watershed Boundary Dataset Name derived from the FRS Best Pick Coordinate

AttainsSource.title: ATTAINS Source
AttainsSource.description: The CWA Report in which the waterbody data can be found. The data are from the Assessment TMDL Tracking & Implementation System (ATTAINS) database.

CWPImpWaterFlg.title: Impaired Water Body
CWPImpWaterFlg.description: Displays "Y" if the permitted facility discharges directly into category 4 or 5 impaired waters, as designated under section 303(d) of the Clean Water Act.

AttainsImpWaterFlg.title: ATTAINS Impaired Water Flag
AttainsImpWaterFlg.description: Displays "Y" if the waterbody in which the facility resides is listed for impairment. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

AttainsAuCategory.title: ATTAINS Assessment Unit Category
AttainsAuCategory.description:
The impairment class or category of the waterbody in which the facility is permitted to discharge directly. The data are from the ATTAINS database:
- 5  = Impaired: TMDL needed. Available information indicates that at least one designated use is not being supported and a TMDL is needed (also known as the 303(d) listed waters).
- 4  = Impaired: TMDL not needed. Available information indicates that at least one designated use is not being supported, but a TMDL is not needed (see subcategories).
- 4a = TMDL completed. A TMDL has been completed, but impairment still exists.
- 4b = TMDL alternative. Impairment is being addressed by a method other than a TMDL (e.g., stream bank improvements).
- 4c = Non-pollutant causes. Cause of impairment is not a pollutant (e.g., habitat destruction).

AttainsStateCauses.title: ATTAINS State Causes
AttainsStateCauses.description: Lists all pollutants or stressors that are causing impairment in the assessed waterbody. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

AttainsCauseGroups.title: ATTAINS Cause Groups
AttainsCauseGroups.description: Lists all groups of pollutants or stressors that are causing impairment in the assessed waterbody. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

AttainsPossibleNPDESParams.title: ATTAINS Possible NPDES Parameters
AttainsPossibleNPDESParams.description: Lists all pollutants discharged by the facility that are potentially contributing to the impairment of local waterbodies.

AttainsAquaticLifeUseFlg.title: ATTAINS Aquatic Life Use Flag
AttainsAquaticLifeUseFlg.description: Displays "Y" if the waterbody in which the facility resides is designated for aquatic life use. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

AttainsExceptnlUseFlg.title: ATTAINS Exceptional Use Flag
AttainsExceptnlUseFlg.description: Displays "Y" if the waterbody in which the facility resides is designated for exceptional use. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

AttainsRecreationUseFlg.title: ATTAINS Recreational Use Flag
AttainsRecreationUseFlg.description: Displays "Y" if the waterbody in which the facility resides is designated for recreational use. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

AttainsShellfishUseFlg.title: ATTAINS Shellfish Use Flag
AttainsShellfishUseFlg.description: Displays "Y" if the waterbody in which the facility resides is designated for shellfish use. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

BeachCloseLastYearFlg.description: Displays "Y" if the facility is located on or near a waterbody with a beach closure within the last year.

BeachCloseLast2yrsFlg.description: Displays "Y" if the facility is located on or near a waterbody with a beach closure within the last two years.

ChesapeakeBayFlag.title: Chesapeake Bay Flag
ChesapeakeBayFlag.description: Displays "Y" if the facility is located within the Chesapeake Bay watershed.

EPASystem.title: EPA Data System
EPASystem.description:
The EPA data system in which permit and facility records are kept. EPA's Facility Registry System (FRS) links all program database records (such as permit IDs and IDs facilities use in reporting to EPA) together. The following list describes the individual data systems that are linked to from the detailed facility report: 

- AFS: Air Facility System for Clean Air Act stationary source programs.
- ICP: Integrated Compliance Information System for Clean Water Act programs monitoring National Pollutant Discharge Elimination System (NPDES) permits.
- RCR: Resource Conservation and Recovery Act Information System (RCRAInfo) for tracking the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act (RCRA) programs.
- NCDB: National Compliance Database System for monitoring national performance of the Toxic Substance Control Act (TSCA); the Emergency Planning and Right-to-Know Act, Section 313 (EPCRA); the Asbestos Hazard Emergency Response (AHERA); and the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act (FIFRA).
- TRI: Toxics Release Inventory for Emergency Planning and Community Right-to-Know Act, Section 313 submissions.
- NEI: National Emissions Inventory database contains information on stationary and mobile sources that emit criteria air pollutants and their precursors, as well as hazardous air pollutants (HAPs). The database includes estimates of annual emissions, by source, of air pollutants in each area of the country, on an annual basis.
- TSCA: Toxic Substances Control Act addressing the production, importation, use, and disposal of specific chemicals.

Statute.title: Regulatory Statute
Statute.description:
The name of the statute associated with each of the permits and identifiers linked to the facility: 
- CAA = the Clean Air Act
- CWA = the Clean Water Act
- RCRA = the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act
- EP313 = the Emergency Planning and Community Right-to-Know Act, Section 313 (also known as the Toxics Release Inventory Program)
- TSCA = the Toxic Substances Control Act
- SDWA = the Safe Drinking Water Act

CWPTRIbalLandCode.title: ICIS Tribal Land Code
CWPTRIbalLandCode.description: From ICIS, the unique identifier for every unit of land within Indian Country.

CWPPermitStatusCode.title: Permit Status (Code)
CWPPermitStatusCode.description: The code associated with the facility's NPDES permit status.

CWPPermitTypeCode.title: Permit Type (Code)
CWPPermitTypeCode.description: The code associated with the facility's NPDES permit classification.

CWPSNCEventDesc.description: Describes the event that resulted in the facility's status of Significant Noncompliance.

FacMapFlg.title: Facility Mapped Flag
FacMapFlg.description: Graphical indicator denoting whether geographical data required to map a facility are available.

FacMapIcon.title: Facility Map Icon
FacMapIcon.description: The default map icon image file calculated for the facility by the ECHO program.

CWPDateLastPenalty.description: Indicates date of most recent penalty against the facility.

FacTRIReporter.title: Facility TRI Reporter
FacTRIReporter.description: Indicates whether facility reported to the Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) for the most recent reporting year.

CWP13qtrsComplHistory.title: CWP 13 Quarters Compliance History
CWP13qtrsComplHistory.description:
The facility's 3-year or 13-quarter compliance status history by quarter (3-month period). Each character represents a quarter of compliance, going from oldest to most recent. Character values correspond to the following compliance statuses:
_ -No Violation Identified
V -Violation Identified
S -High Priority Violation
U - Undetermined

CWPCaseIDs.description: Indicates the ICIS Case Number, a unique number identifying the civil enforcement action.

CWPFIPSCode.title: CWP FIPS Code
CWPFIPSCode.description: A 5 digit combination of the 2 digit Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) code for the state and the 3 digit FIPS code of the county that a facility is located in.

DMRImpairedPoll.example: Mercury | Oil and grease | Solids, total suspended | Temperature, water deg. centigrade | Temperature, water deg. fahrenheit | pH
DMRImpairedPoll.description: The pollutants with limits or monitoring requirements in a facility's NPDES permit with the potential to contribute to impairment of local waterbodies

CurrSvFlag.title: Current Significant Violation Flag
CurrSvFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has a current significant violation. 1 = Yes

ViolFlag.title: Violation Flag
ViolFlag.description: Indicates if the facility had a violation within the last 3 years. 1 = Yes

CurrVioFlag.title: Current Violation Flag
CurrVioFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has a current violation. 1 = Yes

Insp5yrFlag.title: Inspected Within Last Five Years Flag
Insp5yrFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has an inspection within the last 5 years. 1 = Yes

Ea5yrFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has a formal enforcement action within the last 5 years. 1 = Yes

Infea5yrFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has an informal enforcement action within the last 5 years. 1 = Yes.

CWPTotalPenalties.description: The total penalty value incurred over 5 years.

TRIbalFlag.title: Tribal Lands Flag
TRIbalFlag.description: A flag indicating that the facility is within a tribal area.

CensusBlockGroup.title: Census Block Group
CensusBlockGroup.description: A geographic unit used by the United States Census Bureau, generally defined to contain between 600 and 3,000 people.

MaxPctileUs.description: The maximum percentile from all individual EJSCREEN indicators.

EjscreenFlag.description: A Y/N indicator identifying whether or not the facility is within an Environmental Justice area.

LastDMRValueRcvdDate.title: Last DMR Value Received Date
LastDMRValueRcvdDate.description: The latest date that a Discharge Monitoring Report was received by the State or EPA.

Lower48.description: Flag showing Y/N whether location is within the contiguous (lower 48) United States.

ActiveLower48.description: A Y/N indicator indicating that the facility is active and located within the lower 48 contiguous US States.

EffExceeds.title: Effluent Exceedances
EffExceeds.description: The number of E90 Effluent Violations in the last 3 years.

PastCalYrAverageFlow.title: Past Calendar Year Average Flow
PastCalYrAverageFlow.description: The past calendar year average flow in Million Gallons a Day (MGD).

PastCalYrToxicPollutants.title: DMR Toxic Pollutants
PastCalYrToxicPollutants.description: The toxic pollutants discharged by the NPDES facility for the most recent complete calendar year.

CWPVioStatus.title: Current RNC Violation Status
CWPVioStatus.description: The current Reportable Non Compliance value for the facility.

IndswFlag.title: Industrial Stormwater Flag
IndswFlag.description: A value of Y indicates an Industrial Stormwater Permit.

CertifiedDate.title: Certified Date
CertifiedDate.description: The issue date or effective date of the permit.

ReferencePoint.title: Reference Point
ReferencePoint.example: ENTRANCE POINT OF A FACILITY OR STATION

CalculatedAccuracyMeters.title: Calculated Accuracy in Meters
CalculatedAccuracyMeters.description: The estimated accuracy in Meters for the facility's geospatial coordinate.

BiosolidsFlag.description: A Yes/No field to indicate permits with biosolids management and compliance information.

VioLastYear.title: Water Program Violation Flag
VioLastYear.description: A flag (values of 1 for Yes, 0 for No) that a Water Program Violation occurred in the last 4 quarters.

StateAuthNPDES.title: State Authorization NPDES Facilities
StateAuthNPDES.description: Indicates whether the state/tribe/territory code (first 2 digits of the NPDES_ID/SOURCE_ID) is authorized for NPDES Facilities.

StateAuthFedfac.title: State Authorization Federal Facilities
StateAuthFedfac.description: Indicates whether the state/tribe/territory code (first 2 digits of the NPDES_ID/SOURCE_ID) is authorized to regulate Federally owned facilities.

StateAuthPretreat.title: State Authorization Pretreatment Facilities
StateAuthPretreat.description: Indicates whether the state/tribe/territory code (first 2 digits of the NPDES_ID/SOURCE_ID) is authorized for Pretreatment Facilities.

StateAuthGen.title: State Authorization General Facilities
StateAuthGen.description: Indicates whether the state/tribe/territory code (first 2 digits of the NPDES_ID/SOURCE_ID) is authorized for General NPDES Facilities.

StateAuthBiosolids.title: State Authorization Biosolids
StateAuthBiosolids.description: Indicates whether the state/tribe/territory code (first 2 digits of the NPDES_ID/SOURCE_ID) is authorized for Biosolids.

NPDESDataGroups.title: NPDES Data Group Codes
NPDESDataGroups.description: This is the code indicating the NPDES eReporting Rule Data Group that applies to the data.

PermittingAgency.title: Permitting Agency
PermittingAgency.description: This is the type of organization issuing or granting a permit.

ElectrRptWaiverTypeCode.title: Electronic Reporting Waiver Type Code
ElectrRptWaiverTypeCode.description: The unique code that identifies whether the authorized NPDES program has granted the permittee a waiver from electronic reporting in compliance with this part (e.g,  temporary waiver, permanent waiver). This data element should be left blank if the permittee does not have a waiver from electronic reporting in compliance with this part.

ElectrRptWaiverTypeDesc.title: Electronic Waiver Type Code Description
ElectrRptWaiverTypeDesc.description: Description of the unique code that identifies whether the authorized NPDES program has granted the permittee a waiver from electronic reporting in compliance with this part (e.g,  temporary waiver, permanent waiver). This data element should be left blank if the permittee does not have a waiver from electronic reporting in compliance with this part.

ElectrRptWaiverEffDate.title: Electronic Reporting Waiver Effective Date
ElectrRptWaiverEffDate.description: This is the effective date for a  waiver from electronic reporting in compliance with this part. This data element should always be populated for a waiver.

ElectrRptWaiverExpDate.title: Electronic Reporting Waiver Expiration Date
ElectrRptWaiverExpDate.description: This is the expiration date for a temporary waiver from electronic reporting in compliance with this part. This data element should be left blank if the permittee has a permanent waiver from electronic reporting or if the permittee does not have a waiver from electronic reporting in compliance with this part.

ElectrSubmissionTypeCode.title: Electronic Submission Type Code
ElectrSubmissionTypeCode.description: This is the code indicating the means by which the data were submitted electronically.

ElectrSubmissionTypeDesc.title: Electronic Submission Type Code Description
ElectrSubmissionTypeDesc.description: This is the description of the code indicating the means by which the data were submitted electronically.

WebDocs.title: Web Documents
WebDocs.description: Contains flags that identify what web accessible documents are available for the facility.

E90Exceeds2yr.title: E90 Exceedences 2 Years

E90Pollutants5yr.description: The pollutants for the E90 Exceedences in the last 5 years.

E90Pollutants4yr.title: E90 Pollutants 4 Years
E90Pollutants4yr.description: The pollutants for the E90 Exceedences in the last 4 years.

E90Pollutants3yr.title: E90 Pollutants 3 Years
E90Pollutants3yr.description: The pollutants for the E90 Exceedences in the last 3 years.

E90Pollutants2yr.title: E90 Pollutants 2 Years
E90Pollutants2yr.description: The pollutants for the E90 Exceedences in the last 2 years.

E90Pollutants1yr.title: E90 Pollutants 1 Year
E90Pollutants1yr.description: The pollutants for the E90 Exceedences in the last year.

FacCountyName.title: FRS Facility County Name
FacCountyName.description: The facility county name from EPA's Facility Registry System

FacStdCountyName.title: FRS Standardized Facility County Name
FacStdCountyName.description: The standardized  facility county name from EPA's Facility Registry System

MaxScore.description: A sorting score for internal use.

Facilities.title: Facilities
Facilities.description: A complex array of facility information.

type.title: Feature
type.description: Static marker indicating object is a GeoJSON Feature.

CWPName.title: Facility Name
CWPName.description: Facility or permit holder name, as maintained in ICIS-NPDES.

CWPCity.title: City
CWPCity.description: City in which the facility is located.

CWPStateDistrict.description: The State Congressional District the facility is located within.

MasterExternalPermitNmbr.title: Master External Permit Number

RegistryID.title: FRS ID
