FacDerivedCd113.title: Derived 113th Congressional District
FacDerivedCd113.description: The 113th Congressional District derived from the facility coordinate.

FacDerivedCb2010.title: Derived 2010 Census Block
FacDerivedCb2010.description: The 2010 Census Block derived from the facility coordinate.

FacActiveFlag.title: Facility Active Flag
FacActiveFlag.description: Indicates whether any of the associated ICIS-Air, ICIS-NPDES, RCRAInfo or SDWIS permits/facilities are in an active status.

FacMyrtkUniverse.title: My Right-to-Know Universe
FacMyrtkUniverse.description: A 3-digit combination of Y/N flags indicating if the facility is considered a Right-to-Know Network (RTKNet) CAA (position 1), NPDES (position 2), or RCRA facility (position 3).

AIRFlag.title: Clean Air Act Flag
AIRFlag.description: Indicates whether the facility has a Clean Air Act (CAA) permit.

NPDESFlag.title: NPDES Flag
NPDESFlag.description: Indicates whether the facility has a Clean Water Act (CWA) permit.

SDWISFlag.title: SDWIS Flag
SDWISFlag.description: Indicates whether the facility has a Safe Drinking Water Information System (SDWIS) ID.

RCRAFlag.title: Resource Recovery and Conservation Act Flag
RCRAFlag.description: Indicates whether the facility has a Resource Conservation and Recovery Action (RCRA) permit.

TRIFlag.title: Toxics Release Inventory Program Flag
TRIFlag.description: Indicates whether the facility has a Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) permit.

GHGFlag.title: Greenhouse Gas Flag
GHGFlag.description: Indicates whether the facility has a Greenhouse Gas (GHG) permit.

CAANAICS.title: CAA NAICS
CAANAICS.description: The CAA permit's primary North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) Codes.

CAASICs.title: CAA SIC
CAASICs.description: The CAA permit's primary Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) Codes.

CAADateLastFormalAction.title: CWA Date of Last Formal Enforcement Action
CAADateLastFormalAction.description: The effective date of the most recent listed enforcement action entered into the CAA program database.

CAALastPenaltyDate.title: CWA Date of Last Penalty
CAALastPenaltyDate.description: The effective date of the most recent penalty entered into the CAA program database.

CAAHpvFlag.title: CAA HPV Flag
CAAHpvFlag.description: The High Priority Violator (HPV) status for the facility during the most recent quarter reflects the time the records were extracted from the program data system. "Y" indicates the facility is in HPV for the permit or site in question and may pose a more severe level of environmental threat. "N" indicates the permit or site is not considered in HPV.

CWAComplianceTracking.title: CWA Compliance Tracking
CWAComplianceTracking.description: The Compliance Tracking classifications which can assist in interpreting the facility's compliance status, particularly for non-major standard permittees.

CWANAICS.title: CWA NAICS Code
CWANAICS.description: The CWA permit's primary North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) Codes.

CWASICs.title: CWA SIC Code
CWASICs.description: The CWA permit's primary Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) Codes.

CWADateLastFormalAction.title: CWA Date of Last Formal Enforcement Action
CWADateLastFormalAction.description: The effective date of the most recent listed enforcement action entered into the CWA program database.

CWALastPenaltyDate.title: CWA Date of Last Penalty
CWALastPenaltyDate.description: The effective date of the most recent penalty entered into the CWA program database.

CWALastPenaltyAmt.title: CWA Last Penalty Amount
CWALastPenaltyAmt.description: The amount of the most recent penalty entered into the CWA program database.

CWAQtrsWithNC.title: CWA Quarters with Violation
CWAQtrsWithNC.description: The number of quarters, out of the last twelve quarters, in which the CWA permit is considered in violation.

CWASNCFlag.title: CWA SNC Flag
CWASNCFlag.description: The CWA Significant Non-compliance (SNC) status for the facility during the most recent quarter reflects the time the records were extracted from the program data systems. "Y" indicates the facility is in SNC for the permit or site in question and may pose a more severe level of environmental threat. "N" indicates the permit or site is not considered in SNC.

CWA13qtrsEfflntExceedances.title: Effluent Exceedances in past 13 Quarters
CWA13qtrsEfflntExceedances.description: The number of effluent violations at the facility in the past 13 quarters.

CWA3YrQncrCodes.title: 3 Year QNCR Codes
CWA3YrQncrCodes.description: No longer used.  Will be deleted in nthe future.

RCRANAICS.title: RCRA NAICS Code
RCRANAICS.description: The RCRA permit's primary North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) Code.

RCRADateLastFormalAction.title: RCRA Date of Last Formal Enforcement Action
RCRADateLastFormalAction.description: The effective date of the most recent listed enforcement action entered into the RCRA program database.

RCRALastPenaltyDate.title: RCRA Last Penalty Date
RCRALastPenaltyDate.description: Indicates the date on which the most recent assessed (or final) penalty was taken against the facility, entered in the RCRAInfo program database.

RCRALastPenaltyAmt.title: RCRA Last Penalty Amount
RCRALastPenaltyAmt.description: The amount of the most recent penalty entered into the RCRA program database.

RCRASNCFlag.title: RCRA SNC Flag
RCRASNCFlag.description: The RCRA Significant Non-compliance (SNC) status for the facility during the most recent quarter reflects the time the records were extracted from the program data systems. "Y" indicates the facility is in SNC for the permit or site in question and may pose a more severe level of environmental threat. "N" indicates the permit or site is not considered in SNC.

SDWASNCFlag.title: SDWA SNC Flag
SDWASNCFlag.description: Indicates whether the Water System has a Serious Violation.

TRIOffSiteTransfers.title: Toxics Release Inventory Offsite Transfer Count

TRIReporterInPast.title: Toxics Release Inventory Reporter In Past Flag
TRIReporterInPast.description: A 'Y' indicates a TRI Reporter from a prior year.

FecLastCaseDate.title: Last Enforcement Case Date
FecLastCaseDate.description: The date of the latest Federal Enforcement Case related to this Facility in the ICIS system.

DfrUrl.title: DFR URL
DfrUrl.description: The URL to the facility's Detailed Facility Report.

FacDateLastInspectionEPA.title: Date Last EPA Inspection
FacDateLastInspectionEPA.description: The date of the facility's last inspection.

FacDateLastInspectionState.title: Date Last Inspection by State
FacDateLastInspectionState.description: The date on which the most recent "olfficial"  inspection of the facility by a state agency took place.

FacDateLastFormalActEPA.title: Date Last EPA Formal Enforcement Action
FacDateLastFormalActEPA.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed formal enforcement action taken against the facility.

FacDateLastFormalActSt.title: Date Last Formal Enforcement Action by State
FacDateLastFormalActSt.description: The effective date of the most recent listed formal enforcement action taken against the facility by a state agency.

FacDateLastInformalActEPA.title: Date Last EPA Informal Enforcement Action
FacDateLastInformalActEPA.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed informal enforcement action taken against the facility.

FacDateLastInformalActSt.title: Date Last Informal Enforcement Action by State
FacDateLastInformalActSt.description: The effective date of the most recent listed informal enforcement action taken against the facility by a state agency.

TRIReporter.title: Toxics Release Inventory Reporter
TRIReporter.description: Indicates whether or not the facility reported to the Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) for the most recent reporting year.

FacImpWaterFlg.title: Impaired Waters Flag
FacImpWaterFlg.description: Indicates whether or not the facility discharges directly into category 4 or 5 impaired water, as designated under section 303(d) of the Clean Water Act.

NC.title: Non-complianceFlag
NC.description: Indicates whether or not the permit or site is considered either in Non-compliance (NC), Significant Non-compliance (SNC) or High Priority violation (HPV) status.

FacMapFlg.title: Facility Mapped Flag
FacMapFlg.description: Graphical indicator denoting whether geographical data required to map a facility are available.

CensusBlockGroup.title: Census Block Group
CensusBlockGroup.description: A geographic unit used by the United States Census Bureau, generally defined to contain between 600 and 3,000 people.

MaxPctileUs.description: The maximum percentile from all individual EJSCREEN indicators.

EjscreenFlagUs.title: EJ Screen Flag (US)
EjscreenFlagUs.description: A Y/N indicator identifying whether or not the facility is within an Environmental Justice area.

EjscreenFlag.title: EJ Screen Flag
EjscreenFlag.description: A Y/N indicator identifying whether or not the facility is within an Environmental Justice area.

TRIbalFlag.title: Tribal Lands Flag
TRIbalFlag.description: A value of "1" indicates that the facility is within an Indian Tribal or Alaskan Native Village area.

CurrSvFlag.title: Current Significant Violation Flag
CurrSvFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has a current significant violation. 1 = Yes

ViolFlag.title: Violation Flag
ViolFlag.description: Indicates if the facility had a violation within the last 3 years. 1 = Yes

CurrVioFlag.title: Current Violation Flag
CurrVioFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has a current violation. 1 = Yes

Insp5yrFlag.title: Inspected Within Last Five Years Flag
Insp5yrFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has an inspection within the last 5 years. 1 = Yes

Ea5yrFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has a formal enforcement action within the last 5 years. 1 = Yes

Infea5yrFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has an informal enforcement action within the last 5 years. 1 = Yes.

Lower48.title: Contiguous United States Flag
Lower48.description: Flag showing Y/N whether location is within the contiguous (lower 48) United States.

ActiveLower48.description: A Y/N indicator indicating that the facility is active and located within the lower 48 contiguous US States.

FacDerivedWBDHu12Name.title: Derived WBD HUC-12 Name
FacDerivedWBDHu12Name.description: The Watershed Boundary Dataset name derived from the facility coordinate.

FacDerivedRadWBDHu12.title: Derived RAD WBD HUC-12
FacDerivedRadWBDHu12.description: The 12-digit Watershed Boundary Dataset code derived from Reach Indexing the facility's spatial coordinate against the 12 digit Watershed Boundary Dataset from USGS.

FacDerivedRadWBDHu12Name.title: Derived RAD WBD HUC-12 Name
FacDerivedRadWBDHu12Name.description: The 12 digit Watershed Boundary Dataset name derived from Reach Indexing the facility's spatial coordinate against the 12 digit Watershed Boundary Dataset from USGS.

EisFlag.title: Emissions Inventory System Flag
EisFlag.description: Indicates whether the facility reports to the Emissions Inventory System (EIS).

TscaFlag.title: Toxic Substances Control Act Flag
TscaFlag.description: Flag indicating whether or not a facility has a TSCA ID

WebDocs.title: Web Documents
WebDocs.description: Contains flags that identify what web accessible documents are available for the facility.

NaaCategories.title: NAA Categories
NaaCategories.description: The nonattainment area categories that the facility is in, derived spatially based on the facility's geographic coordinates in FRS.

NaaPollutants.title: NAA Pollutants
NaaPollutants.description: All criteria pollutants that the facility is in nonattainment for.

EpcraInspections5yr.title: EPCRA Inspections (Past 5 Years)
EpcraInspections5yr.description: From ICIS FE&C, the number of EPCRA inspections at the facility in the past five years.

FifraInspections5yr.title: FIFRA Inspections (Past 5 Years)
FifraInspections5yr.description: From ICIS FE&C, the number of FIFRA inspections at the facility in the past five years.

TscaInspections5yr.title: TSCA Inspections (Past 5 Years)
TscaInspections5yr.description: From ICIS FE&C, the number of TSCA inspections at the facility in the past five years.

SDWAInspections5yr.title: SDWA Inspections (Past 5 Years)
SDWAInspections5yr.description: The number of SDWA inspections at the facility in the past five years.

SDWAQtrsWithNC.title: SDWA Quarters with Violation
SDWAQtrsWithNC.description: The number of quarters, out of the last twelve quarters, in which the SDWA permit is considered in violation.

BiosolidsFlag.description: A Yes/No field to indicate permits with biosolids management and compliance information.

FacStdCountyName.title: FRS Standardized Facility County Name
FacStdCountyName.description: The standardized  facility county name from EPA's Facility Registry System

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Field to record messages (typically performance-related) about packet processing

QueryID.title: Query Identifier
QueryID.description: Sequential number assigned to entire search result

PageNo.title: Page Number
PageNo.description: The number of pages of results returned

Facilities.title: Facilities
Facilities.description: A complex array of facility information.

VersionNmbr.title: Version Number
VersionNmbr.description: The version of the permit when a modification or reissuance is applied to the permit. Version = 0 indicates the original permit issuance

PermFeatureId.title: Permit Feature ID
PermFeatureId.description: The unique identifier in ICIS-NPDES of a permitted feature or outfall

LimitSetId.title: Limit Set ID
LimitSetId.description: The unique identifier for a limit set, generated in ICIS-NPDES

LimitSetScheduleId.title: Limit Set Schedule ID
LimitSetScheduleId.description: The unique identifier of the Limit Set Schedule, generated in ICIS-NPDES

NmbrOfSubmission.title: Number of Submissions
NmbrOfSubmission.description: The number of months of discharges represented on each DMR for the limit set (e.g., monthly = 1, bi-monthly = 2, quarterly = 3, triannual = 4, semi-annual = 6, annual = 12). This data element will be blank for Unscheduled Limit Sets

LimitId.title: Limit ID
LimitId.description: The unique identifier for a limit parameter record

LimitBeginDate.title: Limit Begin Date
LimitBeginDate.description: The date on which a limit becomes in effect for a particular parameter in a limit set

LimitEndDate.title: Limit End Date
LimitEndDate.description: The date on which a limit stops being in effect for a particular parameter in a limit set

LimitValueId.title: Limit Value ID
LimitValueId.description: The unique identifier in ICIS-NPDES for the Limit Value

LimitValueTypeCode.title: Limit Value Code
LimitValueTypeCode.description: The code indicating the type of value the limit is given as (i.e., Q1, Q2, C1, C2, C3)

LimitValueTypeDesc.title: Limit Value Type
LimitValueTypeDesc.description: The description indicating the type of value the limit is given as (e.g., Concentration, Quantity)

LimitValueNmbr.title: Limit Value
LimitValueNmbr.description: The numerical limit for a given parameter

LimitUnitCode.title: Limit Unit Code
LimitUnitCode.description: The code representing the unit of measure applicable to quantity or concentration limits and measurements as entered by the user

LimitUnitDesc.title: Limit Unit Description
LimitUnitDesc.description: The short description of the unit of measure applicable to limit or DMR values

StdUnitCode.title: Standard Unit Code
StdUnitCode.description: The code representing the standard unit of measure applicable to quantity or concentration limits and measurements as entered by the user

StdUnitDesc.title: Standard Unit Description
StdUnitDesc.description: The short description of the standard unit of measure applicable to limit or DMR values

LimitValueStdUnits.title: Limit Value in Standard Units
LimitValueStdUnits.description: The limit value expressed in standard units, as calculated in ICIS-NPDES

StatisticalBaseCode.title: Statistical Base Code
StatisticalBaseCode.description: The code representing the unit of measure applicable to the limit and DMR values entered by the user (e.g., 30-day average, daily maximum)

StatisticalBaseTypeCode.title: Statistical Base Type Code
StatisticalBaseTypeCode.description: The code indicating whether the statistical base code is a minimum, average, or maximum for purposes of calculating compliance against the limit value

StatisticalBaseTypeDesc.title: Statistical Base Type
StatisticalBaseTypeDesc.description: A short description for indicating whether the statistical base code is a minimum, average, or maximum for purposes of calculating compliance against the limit value

LimitValueQualifierCode.title: Limit Value Qualifier
LimitValueQualifierCode.description: The unique code identifying the limit value operator (i.e., <, <=, >, >=, T, E, =). E indicates an estimated value. T indicates too numerous to count

StayValueNmbr.title: Stay Value Number
StayValueNmbr.description: The numeric limit value imposed during the period of the stay for the limit; if entered, during the stay period, ICIS-NPDES will use this limit value for calculating compliance rather than the actual limit value

DMREventId.title: DMR Event ID
DMREventId.description: The sequence ID identifying the DMR Event.

MonitoringPeriodEndDate.title: Monitoring Period End Date
MonitoringPeriodEndDate.description: The date that the monitoring period for the values covered by the DMR Form ends

DMRFormValueId.title: Measured Value ID
DMRFormValueId.description: The sequence ID identifying the DMR Form Value.

ValueTypeCode.title: Measured Value Type Code
ValueTypeCode.description: The indication of the limit value type (e.g., Quantity 1, Concentration 2)

ValueTypeDesc.title: Measured Value Type
ValueTypeDesc.description: The type of value the measured number is given as (e.g., Concentration, Quantity)

DMRValueId.title: Measured Value ID
DMRValueId.description: The unique identifier for the DMR value generated in ICIS-NPDES

DMRValueNmbr.title: Measured Value
DMRValueNmbr.description: The DMR value number reported on the DMR Form

DMRUnitCode.title: Measured Value Unit Code
DMRUnitCode.description: The code representing the unit of measure applicable to quantity or concentration limits and measurements as entered into ICIS-NPDES

DMRUnitDesc.title: Measured Value Unit
DMRUnitDesc.description: The short description of the unit of measure applicable to limit or DMR values

DMRValueStdUnits.title: Measured Value Standard Units
DMRValueStdUnits.description: The DMR value expressed in standard units, as calculated in ICIS-NPDES

DMRValueQualifierCode.title: DMR Value Qualifier Code
DMRValueQualifierCode.description: The unique code identifying the DMR value operator (i.e., <, <=, >, >=, T, E, =). E indicates an estimated value. T indicates too numerous to count

ValueReceivedDate.title: Date Received
ValueReceivedDate.description: The date the DMR value was received by the regulatory authority

DaysLate.title: Days Received Late
DaysLate.description: The number of days the DMR value is late, as generated in ICIS-NPDES

NODICode.title: No Discharge Code
NODICode.description: The unique code indicating why no DMR Value was submitted by the permittee for a Monitoring Period End Date

ExceedencePct.title: Exceedance Percentage
ExceedencePct.description: The percent by which the DMR value (or adjusted value) exceeded its limit (or stay) value, as generated in ICIS-NPDES

NPDESViolationId.title: NPDES Violation ID
NPDESViolationId.description: The unique identifier in ICIS-NPDES for the NPDES Violation

ViolationCode.title: Violation Code
ViolationCode.description: The code identifying which type of Violation has occurred (e.g., D80 = Required Monitoring DMR Value Non-Receipt, E90 = Effluent Violation, C20 = Schedule Event Achieved Late)

ViolationDesc.title: Violation
ViolationDesc.description: A description of which type of violation has occurred

RNCDetectionCode.title: RNC Violation Code
RNCDetectionCode.description:
The code indicating the reportable noncompliance (RNC) detected for a violation:
- A = Enforcement Order
- B = Manual 2A4 - Pass-Through
- C = Chronic Violation
- D = Manual Other
- E = Manual 2F - Permit Narrative
- F = Manual 2G - Violation of Concern
- G = Manual 2A1 - Effluent Violation
- H = Chronic Violation, Non-Monthly Average
- I = Manual 2A2 - Unauthorized Bypass
- J = Manual 2A3 - Unpermitted Discharge
- K = Non-receipt Violation, Non-Monthly Average
- N = Non-Receipt of DMR/Schedule Report
- P = Enforcement Order, Non-Monthly Average
- Q = Manual 2B - Pretreatment
- R = TRC Limitations Exceeded, Non-Monthly Average
- S = Schedule Violation
- T = TRC Limitations Exceeded
- U = Other Violation with TRC Non-Monthly Average
- V = Other Violation with TRC
- W = Manual 2E - Deficient Report
- X = Manual Other Violation with TRC
- Y = Manual TRC
- Z = Manual Chronic

RNCDetectionDesc.title: RNC Violation
RNCDetectionDesc.description: A description of the reportable noncompliance (RNC) detected

RNCDetectionDate.title: Detection Date
RNCDetectionDate.description: The date that the exceedance was detected

RNCResolutionCode.title: RNC Resolution Type Code
RNCResolutionCode.description: The code indicating the resolution of noncompliance (RNC) for a violation

RNCResolutionDesc.title: RNC Resolution Type
RNCResolutionDesc.description:
- 1 = Unresolved RNC
- 2 = Back into Compliance
- 3 = Due to Formal Enforcement Action Final Order with Compliance Schedule
- 4 = In Compliance with Formal Enforcement Action Final Order Requirement
- 5 = Resolved RP by NPDES Closure of Enforcement Action Final Order with Compliance Schedule
- 6 = Manual Resolution by Enforcement Action
- 7 = Manual RP - In Compliance with Formal Enforcement Action Order Requirement
- 8 = Manual Due to Formal Enforcement Action Formal Order
- 9 = Manual by Back into Compliance
- A = Manual Unresolved RNC
- B = Manual by EPA/State/Tribal Action

RNCResolutionDate.title: Resolution Date
RNCResolutionDate.description: The date RNC was marked to its current resolution status. It can be entered manually or automatically

ViolationSeverity.title: Violation Severity
ViolationSeverity.description:
- 0 = no violation.
- 1 = monitoring or reporting violation
- 2 = effluent violation, i.e., discharge in excess of permitted limit
- 3 = reportable noncompliance
- 5 = significant noncompliance

ParameterCode.title: Parameter Code
ParameterCode.description: The unique 5 digit numeric code identifying the parameter. If the code is less than 5 digits in the .CSV, append zeros to the beginning of the number (e.g., 100 is equivalent to 00100)

ParameterDesc.title: Parameter Description
ParameterDesc.description: The pollutant name and form (e.g., dissolved, suspended) associated with the parameter code

MonitoringLocationCode.title: Monitoring Location Code
MonitoringLocationCode.description: The code that the monitoring location at which the monitoring requirement (and effluent limit if limited) applies. One parameter may have several monitoring location codes pertaining to the same permitted feature

MonitoringLocationDesc.title: Monitoring Location Description
MonitoringLocationDesc.description: The name of the monitoring location at which the monitoring requirement (and effluent limit if limited) applies

StayTypeCode.title: Stay Type Code
StayTypeCode.description: The unique identifier of the type of stay applied to a limit (e.g., X, Y, Z), which indicates whether the limits do not appear on the DMR at all, are treated as monitor only, or have a stay value in effect during the period of the stay

StayTypeDesc.title: Stay Type Description
StayTypeDesc.description: The name of the type of stay applied to a limit, which indicates whether the limits do not appear on the DMR at all (X), are treated as monitor only (Y), or have a stay value in effect during the period of the stay (Z)

DischargeMonitoringReports.title: Effluent Discharge Monitoring Report
DischargeMonitoringReports.description: An array of Discharge Monitoring Report (DMR) data.

PermFeatureNmbr.title: Discharge Point
PermFeatureNmbr.description: A three-character code in ICIS-NPDES that identifies the point of discharge (e.g., outfall) for a facility. A NPDES permit may have multiple points of discharge. If the code is less than three characters in the .CSV, append zeros to the beginning of the number (e.g., 1 is equivalent to 001)

PermFeatureTypeCode.title: Permit Feature Type Code
PermFeatureTypeCode.description: The code indicating the type of permitted feature (e.g., EXO)

PermFeatureTypeDesc.title: Permit Feature Type
PermFeatureTypeDesc.description: The description indicating the type of permitted feature (e.g., External Outfall, Internal Outfall, Sum)

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Field to record messages (typically performance-related) about packet processing

EPASystem.title: EPA Data System
EPASystem.description:
The EPA data system in which permit and facility records are kept. EPA's Facility Registry System (FRS) links all program database records (such as permit IDs and IDs facilities use in reporting to EPA) together. The following list describes the individual data systems that are linked to from the detailed facility report: 

- AFS: Air Facility System for Clean Air Act stationary source programs.
- ICP: Integrated Compliance Information System for Clean Water Act programs monitoring National Pollutant Discharge Elimination System (NPDES) permits.
- RCR: Resource Conservation and Recovery Act Information System (RCRAInfo) for tracking the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act (RCRA) programs.
- NCDB: National Compliance Database System for monitoring national performance of the Toxic Substance Control Act (TSCA); the Emergency Planning and Right-to-Know Act, Section 313 (EPCRA); the Asbestos Hazard Emergency Response (AHERA); and the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act (FIFRA).
- TRI: Toxics Release Inventory for Emergency Planning and Community Right-to-Know Act, Section 313 submissions.
- NEI: National Emissions Inventory database contains information on stationary and mobile sources that emit criteria air pollutants and their precursors, as well as hazardous air pollutants (HAPs). The database includes estimates of annual emissions, by source, of air pollutants in each area of the country, on an annual basis.
- TSCA: Toxic Substances Control Act addressing the production, importation, use, and disposal of specific chemicals.

RegistryId.title: FRS Registry ID
RegistryId.description: 12-digit Facility Registry Service (FRS) identification number.  FRS uniquely identifies a facility by assigning an identification number (FRS ID), and uses this FRS ID to link together all EPA regulatory program database records

Statute.title: Regulatory Statute
Statute.description:
The name of the statute associated with each of the permits and identifiers linked to the facility: 
- CAA = the Clean Air Act
- CWA = the Clean Water Act
- RCRA = the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act
- EP313 = the Emergency Planning and Community Right-to-Know Act, Section 313 (also known as the Toxics Release Inventory Program)
- TSCA = the Toxic Substances Control Act
- SDWA = the Safe Drinking Water Act

CWPName.title: Facility Name
CWPName.description: Facility or permit holder name, as maintained in ICIS-NPDES.

CWPCity.title: City
CWPCity.description: City in which the facility is located.

CWPPermitStatusDesc.title: Permit Status Description
CWPPermitStatusDesc.description: The current stage/status in the NPDES permit life cycle.

CWPMajorMinorStatusFlag.title: Major/Minor Status Flag
CWPMajorMinorStatusFlag.description:
Facilities marked "M" for major refers to CWA major permittees.
- M = Major
- N = Minor

CWPPermitTypeDesc.title: Permit Type Description
CWPPermitTypeDesc.description:
NPDES facility permit classification:
- NPDES Individual Permit
- General Permit Covered Facility
- NPDES Master General Permit
- Associated Permit Record
- Individual Industrial User Permit
- Individual State Issued Permit
- State Issued Master General Permit
- Unpermitted Facility

CWPCurrentSNCStatus.description: The type of noncompliance when a major source is in significant violation or a minor source has a Category 1 violation.

StartDate.title: Start Date
StartDate.description: Starting date for the date range of interest. Formatted as mm/dd/yyyy

EndDate.title: End Date
EndDate.description: End date for the date range of interest. Formatted as mm/dd/yyyy

CWPName.title: Facility Name
CWPName.description: Facility or permit holder name, as maintained in ICIS-NPDES.

CWPCity.title: City
CWPCity.description: City in which the facility is located.

CWPPermitStatusDesc.title: Permit Status Description
CWPPermitStatusDesc.description: The current stage/status in the NPDES permit life cycle.

CWPMajorMinorStatusFlag.title: Major/Minor Status Flag
CWPMajorMinorStatusFlag.description:
Facilities marked "M" for major refers to CWA major permittees.
- M = Major
- N = Minor

CWPPermitTypeDesc.title: Permit Type Description
CWPPermitTypeDesc.description:
NPDES facility permit classification:
- NPDES Individual Permit
- General Permit Covered Facility
- NPDES Master General Permit
- Associated Permit Record
- Individual Industrial User Permit
- Individual State Issued Permit
- State Issued Master General Permit
- Unpermitted Facility

CWPCurrentSNCStatus.description: The type of noncompliance when a major source is in significant violation or a minor source has a Category 1 violation.

ParameterCode.title: Parameter Code
ParameterCode.description: The unique 5 digit numeric code identifying the parameter. If the code is less than 5 digits in the .CSV, append zeros to the beginning of the number (e.g., 100 is equivalent to 00100)

ParameterDesc.title: Parameter Description
ParameterDesc.description: The pollutant name and form (e.g., dissolved, suspended) associated with the parameter code

MaxVioStatus.title: Most Severe Compliance Status
MaxVioStatus.description: The most severe compliance status for an outfall and parameter during the entire selected date range

CurrentVioStatus.title: Current Violation Status
CurrentVioStatus.description: The most severe compliance status for an outfall and parameter during the current monitoring period

PermFeatureNmbr.title: Discharge Point
PermFeatureNmbr.description: A three-character code in ICIS-NPDES that identifies the point of discharge (e.g., outfall) for a facility. A NPDES permit may have multiple points of discharge. If the code is less than three characters in the .CSV, append zeros to the beginning of the number (e.g., 1 is equivalent to 001)

PermFeatureTypeCode.title: Permit Feature Type Code
PermFeatureTypeCode.description: The code indicating the type of permitted feature (e.g., EXO)

PermFeatureTypeDesc.title: Permit Feature Type
PermFeatureTypeDesc.description: The description indicating the type of permitted feature (e.g., External Outfall, Internal Outfall, Sum)

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Field to record messages (typically performance-related) about packet processing

StartDate.title: Start Date
StartDate.description: Starting date for the date range of interest. Formatted as mm/dd/yyyy

EndDate.title: End Date
EndDate.description: End date for the date range of interest. Formatted as mm/dd/yyyy

type.title: Geometry
type.description: Indicator of the geometry represented in the GeoJSON Feature, for Echo will always be "Point".

coordinates.title: Coordinates Array
coordinates.description: Array of coordinate values in longitude, latitude format.

DataType.title: Data Type
DataType.description: Data type for EPA program database column.

DataLength.title: Data Length
DataLength.description: Data length for EPA program database column.

ObjectName.title: Object Name
ObjectName.description: The JSON name used for the database column.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Field to record messages (typically performance-related) about packet processing

RegistryID.title: FRS ID
RegistryID.description: An internal 12-digit Facility Registry Service (FRS) tracking number used to tie all facility data together in EPA regulatory program databases.

FacFederalAgencyName.title: Federal Agency Name
FacFederalAgencyName.description: Indicates the name of the federal agency, as classified in FRS. Federal agencies are installations that are owned and operated by the U.S. government.

FacDerivedHuc.title: Watershed (HUC Code)
FacDerivedHuc.description: The 8-digit Hydrologic Unit Code (HUC) of the watershed in which the facility resides. A HUC number is assigned to every watershed in the nation and uniquely identifies the watershed.

FacFIPSCode.title: FIPS Code
FacFIPSCode.description: The 2-digit Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) code to identify the county that a facility is located in.

FacIndianCntryFlg.title: Facility Indian Country Flag
FacIndianCntryFlg.description: Flag showing Y/N whether the facility is located in Indian Country.

FacIndianSpatialFlg.title: Indian Spatial Flag
FacIndianSpatialFlg.description: Returns “Y” if a facility is located within a tribal spatial boundary as defined by the U.S. Census Bureau 2010 tribal boundary layer data for tribes in the lower 48 states and Bureau of Land Management Alaska State Office data for native villages in Alaska. Returns “N” if a facility is not located within a tribal or native Alaskan village area.

FacDerivedTRIbes.title: FRS Spatially Derived Tribe
FacDerivedTRIbes.description: The tribes or tribal territories located within 25 miles of the facility's location.

FacUsMexBorderFlg.title: Near US-Mexico Border
FacUsMexBorderFlg.description: A Y/N flag indicating that the facility is within 100KM of the US-Mexico Border.

FacSICCodes.title: SIC Codes
FacSICCodes.description: Indicates the facility’s or permit's primary Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) Code. The SIC code describes the primary activity of the facility.

RCRANAICS.title: RCRA NAICS Code
RCRANAICS.description: The RCRA permit's primary North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) Code.

FacLat.title: Latitude
FacLat.description: The latitude of the facility in decimal degrees expressed using the NAD83 horizontal datum. The coordinate comes from the FRS EPA Locational Reference Tables (LRT) file which represents the most accurate value for the facility based on the available spatial metadata.

FacLong.title: Longitude
FacLong.description: The longitude of the facility in decimal degrees expressed using the NAD83 horizontal datum. The coordinate comes from the FRS EPA Locational Reference Tables (LRT) file which represents the most accurate value for the facility based on the available spatial metadata.

CWAIDs.title: CWA IDs
CWAIDs.description: A unique  ID assigned for each record/permit/site/facility within ICIS-NPDES. These identifiers are for used tracking purposes in the individual data systems.

RCRAIDs.title: Resource Conservation and Recovery Act IDs
RCRAIDs.description: A unique 12-character ID assigned for each record/permit/site/facility within the RCRAInfo database.

RmpIDs.title: RMP IDs
RmpIDs.description: A unique ID assigned to each facility submitting a Risk Management Plan to EPA under the Risk Management Plan Rule.

SDWAIDs.description: A unique 9-character ID assigned for each public water system within the Safe Drinking Water Information System (SDWIS).

TRIIDs.title: Toxics Release Inventory Program IDs
TRIIDs.description: A unique 15-character ID assigned for each facility within the Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) program. The format is ZZZZZNNNNNSSSSS, where ZZZZZ = ZIP code, NNNNN = the first 5 consonants of the name, and SSSSS = the first 5 non-blank non-special characters in the street address.

RCRAQtrsWithNC.title: RCRA Quarters with Violation
RCRAQtrsWithNC.description: The number of quarters, out of the last twelve quarters, in which the RCRA permit is considered in violation.

FacDerivedWBD.title: 12-Digit WBD HUC
FacDerivedWBD.description: The Hydrologic Unit Code (HUC-12) of the waterbody in which the facility resides, derived based on location data in FRS.

FacDerivedWBDName.title: FRS Derived Watershed Boundary Dataset (WBD) Name
FacDerivedWBDName.description: The 12 digit Watershed Boundary Dataset Name derived from the FRS Best Pick Coordinate

ChesapeakeBayFlag.title: Chesapeake Bay Flag
ChesapeakeBayFlag.description: Displays "Y" if the facility is located within the Chesapeake Bay watershed.

RCRAPenalties.title: RCRA Penalties
RCRAPenalties.description: The total dollar amount of assessed (or final) penalties taken against the facility within the last five years, entered in the RCRAInfo program database.

RCRALastPenaltyDate.title: RCRA Last Penalty Date
RCRALastPenaltyDate.description: Indicates the date on which the most recent assessed (or final) penalty was taken against the facility, entered in the RCRAInfo program database.

Over80CountUs.title: EJ Indexes Above 80th Percentile
Over80CountUs.description: The number of primary EJSCREEN environmental justice (EJ) indexes exceeding the 80th or higher national percentile for the Census block group that the facility is located in.

PctilePctpre1960Us.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN Lead paint indicator.

PctileDpmUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN diesel particulate matter indicator.

PctileCancerUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN NATA air toxics cancer risk indicator.

PctileRespUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN NATA respiratory hazard index indicator.

PctileTrafficScoreUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN Traffic proximity and volume indicator.

PctileProximityNPDESUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN proximity to major direct water dischargers indicator.

PctileProximityNplUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN proximity to National Priorities List (NPL) sites indicator.

PctileProximityRmpUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN proximity to Risk Management Plan (RMP) sites indicator.

PctileProximityTsdfUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN proximity to Treatment Storage and Disposal Facilities (TSDFs) indicator.

FacPopulationDensity.title: Population Density
FacPopulationDensity.description: The number of persons per square mile in the profiled area.

FacPercentMinority.title: Facility Percent Minority
FacPercentMinority.description: Percent Minority is the percentage of the population of the given area that is considered minority. Statistics are shown for the area within a 3-mile radius of each facility.

EPASystem.title: EPA Data System
EPASystem.description:
The EPA data system in which permit and facility records are kept. EPA's Facility Registry System (FRS) links all program database records (such as permit IDs and IDs facilities use in reporting to EPA) together. The following list describes the individual data systems that are linked to from the detailed facility report: 

- AFS: Air Facility System for Clean Air Act stationary source programs.
- ICP: Integrated Compliance Information System for Clean Water Act programs monitoring National Pollutant Discharge Elimination System (NPDES) permits.
- RCR: Resource Conservation and Recovery Act Information System (RCRAInfo) for tracking the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act (RCRA) programs.
- NCDB: National Compliance Database System for monitoring national performance of the Toxic Substance Control Act (TSCA); the Emergency Planning and Right-to-Know Act, Section 313 (EPCRA); the Asbestos Hazard Emergency Response (AHERA); and the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act (FIFRA).
- TRI: Toxics Release Inventory for Emergency Planning and Community Right-to-Know Act, Section 313 submissions.
- NEI: National Emissions Inventory database contains information on stationary and mobile sources that emit criteria air pollutants and their precursors, as well as hazardous air pollutants (HAPs). The database includes estimates of annual emissions, by source, of air pollutants in each area of the country, on an annual basis.
- TSCA: Toxic Substances Control Act addressing the production, importation, use, and disposal of specific chemicals.

Statute.title: Regulatory Statute
Statute.description:
The name of the statute associated with each of the permits and identifiers linked to the facility: 
- CAA = the Clean Air Act
- CWA = the Clean Water Act
- RCRA = the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act
- EP313 = the Emergency Planning and Community Right-to-Know Act, Section 313 (also known as the Toxics Release Inventory Program)
- TSCA = the Toxic Substances Control Act
- SDWA = the Safe Drinking Water Act

FacFederalAgencyCode.title: Facility Federal Agency Code
FacFederalAgencyCode.description: Indicates the federal agency, as classified in FRS. Federal agencies are installations that are owned and operated by the U.S. government. The five-character code consists of a letter followed by four numbers. There are four possible letters that can occupy the first character position: C = Civilian Federal Agency; D = Department of Defense; E = Department of Energy; X = Unknown. The second and third characters represent the agency code, while the fourth and fifth characters represent the bureau code.

FacTRIReporter.title: Facility TRI Reporter
FacTRIReporter.description: Indicates whether facility reported to the Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) for the most recent reporting year.

FacMapFlg.title: Facility Mapped Flag
FacMapFlg.description: Graphical indicator denoting whether geographical data required to map a facility are available.

FacMapIcon.title: Facility Map Icon
FacMapIcon.description: The default map icon image file calculated for the facility by the ECHO program.

RCRA3yrComplQtrsHistory.title: RCRA 3-Year Compliance History
RCRA3yrComplQtrsHistory.description:
The system's 3-year compliance status history by quarter (3-month period) entered in the RCRA program database. Each character represents a quarter of compliance, going from oldest to most recent. Character values correspond to the following compliance statuses:
_ -No Violation
V -Violation
S -Significant Violation
U - Undetermined

FacFederalAgencyName.description: Indicates the name of the federal agency, as classified in FRS. Federal agencies are installations that are owned and operated by the U.S. government.

FacDerivedHuc.title: Watershed (HUC Code)
FacDerivedHuc.description: The 8-digit Hydrologic Unit Code (HUC) of the watershed in which the facility resides. A HUC number is assigned to every watershed in the nation and uniquely identifies the watershed.

FacFIPSCode.title: FIPS Code
FacFIPSCode.description: The 2-digit Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) code to identify the county that a facility is located in.

FacIndianCntryFlg.title: Facility Indian Country Flag
FacIndianCntryFlg.description: Flag showing Y/N whether the facility is located in Indian Country.

FacIndianSpatialFlg.title: Indian Spatial Flag
FacIndianSpatialFlg.description: Returns “Y” if a facility is located within a tribal spatial boundary as defined by the U.S. Census Bureau 2010 tribal boundary layer data for tribes in the lower 48 states and Bureau of Land Management Alaska State Office data for native villages in Alaska. Returns “N” if a facility is not located within a tribal or native Alaskan village area.

FacDerivedTRIbes.title: FRS Spatially Derived Tribe
FacDerivedTRIbes.description: The tribes or tribal territories located within 25 miles of the facility's location.

FacUsMexBorderFlg.title: Near US-Mexico Border
FacUsMexBorderFlg.description: A Y/N flag indicating that the facility is within 100KM of the US-Mexico Border.

FacSICCodes.title: SIC Codes
FacSICCodes.description: Indicates the facility’s or permit's primary Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) Code. The SIC code describes the primary activity of the facility.

RCRANAICS.title: RCRA NAICS Code
RCRANAICS.description: The RCRA permit's primary North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) Code.

CWAIDs.title: CWA IDs
CWAIDs.description: A unique  ID assigned for each record/permit/site/facility within ICIS-NPDES. These identifiers are for used tracking purposes in the individual data systems.

RCRAIDs.title: Resource Conservation and Recovery Act IDs
RCRAIDs.description: A unique 12-character ID assigned for each record/permit/site/facility within the RCRAInfo database.

RmpIDs.title: RMP IDs
RmpIDs.description: A unique ID assigned to each facility submitting a Risk Management Plan to EPA under the Risk Management Plan Rule.

SDWAIDs.description: A unique 9-character ID assigned for each public water system within the Safe Drinking Water Information System (SDWIS).

TRIIDs.title: Toxics Release Inventory Program IDs
TRIIDs.description: A unique 15-character ID assigned for each facility within the Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) program. The format is ZZZZZNNNNNSSSSS, where ZZZZZ = ZIP code, NNNNN = the first 5 consonants of the name, and SSSSS = the first 5 non-blank non-special characters in the street address.

FacDerivedWBD.title: 12-Digit WBD HUC
FacDerivedWBD.description: The Hydrologic Unit Code (HUC-12) of the waterbody in which the facility resides, derived based on location data in FRS.

FacDerivedWBDName.title: FRS Derived Watershed Boundary Dataset (WBD) Name
FacDerivedWBDName.description: The 12 digit Watershed Boundary Dataset Name derived from the FRS Best Pick Coordinate

ChesapeakeBayFlag.title: Chesapeake Bay Flag
ChesapeakeBayFlag.description: Displays "Y" if the facility is located within the Chesapeake Bay watershed.

RCRALastPenaltyDate.title: RCRA Last Penalty Date
RCRALastPenaltyDate.description: Indicates the date on which the most recent assessed (or final) penalty was taken against the facility, entered in the RCRAInfo program database.

Over80CountUs.title: EJ Indexes Above 80th Percentile
Over80CountUs.description: The number of primary EJSCREEN environmental justice (EJ) indexes exceeding the 80th or higher national percentile for the Census block group that the facility is located in.

PctilePctpre1960Us.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN Lead paint indicator.

PctileDpmUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN diesel particulate matter indicator.

PctileCancerUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN NATA air toxics cancer risk indicator.

PctileRespUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN NATA respiratory hazard index indicator.

PctileTrafficScoreUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN Traffic proximity and volume indicator.

PctileProximityNPDESUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN proximity to major direct water dischargers indicator.

PctileProximityNplUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN proximity to National Priorities List (NPL) sites indicator.

PctileProximityRmpUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN proximity to Risk Management Plan (RMP) sites indicator.

PctileProximityTsdfUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN proximity to Treatment Storage and Disposal Facilities (TSDFs) indicator.

PctileO3Us.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN ozone indicator.

PctilePmUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN particulate matter indicator.

FacPopulationDensity.title: Population Density
FacPopulationDensity.description: The number of persons per square mile in the profiled area.

FacPercentMinority.title: Facility Percent Minority
FacPercentMinority.description: Percent Minority is the percentage of the population of the given area that is considered minority. Statistics are shown for the area within a 3-mile radius of each facility.

EPASystem.title: EPA Data System
EPASystem.description:
The EPA data system in which permit and facility records are kept. EPA's Facility Registry System (FRS) links all program database records (such as permit IDs and IDs facilities use in reporting to EPA) together. The following list describes the individual data systems that are linked to from the detailed facility report: 

- AFS: Air Facility System for Clean Air Act stationary source programs.
- ICP: Integrated Compliance Information System for Clean Water Act programs monitoring National Pollutant Discharge Elimination System (NPDES) permits.
- RCR: Resource Conservation and Recovery Act Information System (RCRAInfo) for tracking the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act (RCRA) programs.
- NCDB: National Compliance Database System for monitoring national performance of the Toxic Substance Control Act (TSCA); the Emergency Planning and Right-to-Know Act, Section 313 (EPCRA); the Asbestos Hazard Emergency Response (AHERA); and the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act (FIFRA).
- TRI: Toxics Release Inventory for Emergency Planning and Community Right-to-Know Act, Section 313 submissions.
- NEI: National Emissions Inventory database contains information on stationary and mobile sources that emit criteria air pollutants and their precursors, as well as hazardous air pollutants (HAPs). The database includes estimates of annual emissions, by source, of air pollutants in each area of the country, on an annual basis.
- TSCA: Toxic Substances Control Act addressing the production, importation, use, and disposal of specific chemicals.

Statute.title: Regulatory Statute
Statute.description:
The name of the statute associated with each of the permits and identifiers linked to the facility: 
- CAA = the Clean Air Act
- CWA = the Clean Water Act
- RCRA = the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act
- EP313 = the Emergency Planning and Community Right-to-Know Act, Section 313 (also known as the Toxics Release Inventory Program)
- TSCA = the Toxic Substances Control Act
- SDWA = the Safe Drinking Water Act

FacFederalAgencyCode.title: Facility Federal Agency Code
FacFederalAgencyCode.description: Indicates the federal agency, as classified in FRS. Federal agencies are installations that are owned and operated by the U.S. government. The five-character code consists of a letter followed by four numbers. There are four possible letters that can occupy the first character position: C = Civilian Federal Agency; D = Department of Defense; E = Department of Energy; X = Unknown. The second and third characters represent the agency code, while the fourth and fifth characters represent the bureau code.

FacTRIReporter.title: Facility TRI Reporter
FacTRIReporter.description: Indicates whether facility reported to the Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) for the most recent reporting year.

FacMapFlg.title: Facility Mapped Flag
FacMapFlg.description: Graphical indicator denoting whether geographical data required to map a facility are available.

FacMapIcon.title: Facility Map Icon
FacMapIcon.description: The default map icon image file calculated for the facility by the ECHO program.

RCRA3yrComplQtrsHistory.title: RCRA 3-Year Compliance History
RCRA3yrComplQtrsHistory.description:
The system's 3-year compliance status history by quarter (3-month period) entered in the RCRA program database. Each character represents a quarter of compliance, going from oldest to most recent. Character values correspond to the following compliance statuses:
_ -No Violation
V -Violation
S -Significant Violation
U - Undetermined

CensusBlockGroup.title: Census Block Group
CensusBlockGroup.description: A geographic unit used by the United States Census Bureau, generally defined to contain between 600 and 3,000 people.

MaxPctileUs.description: The maximum percentile from all individual EJSCREEN indicators.

EjscreenFlagUs.title: EJ Screen Flag (US)
EjscreenFlagUs.description: A Y/N indicator identifying whether or not the facility is within an Environmental Justice area.

EjscreenFlag.title: EJ Screen Flag
EjscreenFlag.description: A Y/N indicator identifying whether or not the facility is within an Environmental Justice area.

TRIbalFlag.title: Tribal Lands Flag
TRIbalFlag.description: A value of "1" indicates that the facility is within an Indian Tribal or Alaskan Native Village area.

CurrSvFlag.title: Current Significant Violation Flag
CurrSvFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has a current significant violation. 1 = Yes

ViolFlag.title: Violation Flag
ViolFlag.description: Indicates if the facility had a violation within the last 3 years. 1 = Yes

CurrVioFlag.title: Current Violation Flag
CurrVioFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has a current violation. 1 = Yes

Insp5yrFlag.title: Inspected Within Last Five Years Flag
Insp5yrFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has an inspection within the last 5 years. 1 = Yes

Ea5yrFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has a formal enforcement action within the last 5 years. 1 = Yes

Infea5yrFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has an informal enforcement action within the last 5 years. 1 = Yes.

Lower48.title: Contiguous United States Flag
Lower48.description: Flag showing Y/N whether location is within the contiguous (lower 48) United States.

ActiveLower48.description: A Y/N indicator indicating that the facility is active and located within the lower 48 contiguous US States.

ReferencePoint.title: Reference Point
ReferencePoint.example: ENTRANCE POINT OF A FACILITY OR STATION

CalculatedAccuracyMeters.title: Calculated Accuracy in Meters
CalculatedAccuracyMeters.description: Indicates the calculated accuracy in meters for the facilities geospatial coordinate.  Generally, the accuracy is directly linked to the collection method where GPS methods are more accurate that manual methods like map or photo interpolations.

WebDocs.title: Web Documents
WebDocs.description: Contains flags that identify what web accessible documents are available for the facility.

FacCountyName.title: FRS Facility County Name
FacCountyName.description: The facility county name from EPA's Facility Registry System

FacStdCountyName.title: FRS Standardized Facility County Name
FacStdCountyName.description: The standardized  facility county name from EPA's Facility Registry System

LAT.title: Latitude
LAT.description: The latitude of the facility in degrees, to four decimal places

LON.title: Longitude
LON.description: The longitude of the facility in degrees, to four decimal places

ICON.title: Icon
ICON.description: Name of each individual icon file within the URL base

TYPE.title: Type
TYPE.description: For DFR, this is always facility

NAME.title: Name
NAME.description: For DFR, this is the Facility name. The name corresponds to the TYPE value

PUV.title: Popup Value
PUV.description: Pop up value. Combine with PopUpBaseURL to give the popup for the facility

RCRAstatus.title: RCRA 3-Year Compliance Status
RCRAstatus.description:
The facility's 3-year compliance status history by quarter (3-month period) entered in the RCRAInfo program database. Each character represents a quarter of compliance, going from oldest to most recent. Character values correspond to the following compliance statuses:
_ -No Violation
V -Violation
S -Significant Violation
U - Undetermined

LastInsp.title: Last Inspection
LastInsp.description: The unique identifier for the last inspection

FormalCount.title: Formal Count
FormalCount.description: The number of formal enforcement actions that have been taken against the facility

InformalCount.title: Informal Count
InformalCount.description: The number of informal enforcement actions that have been taken against the facility

QueryID.title: Query Identifier
QueryID.description: Sequential number assigned to entire search result

IconBaseURL.title: Icon Base URL
IconBaseURL.description: URL where all the icons are located

PopUpBaseURL.title: Popup Base URL
PopUpBaseURL.description: Combine this URL with the PUC to get popup info

MapData.title: Map Data
MapData.description: An array of facility geospatial information.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Field to record messages (typically performance-related) about packet processing

QueryID.title: Query Identifier
QueryID.description: Sequential number assigned to entire search result

Facilities.title: Facilities
Facilities.description: A complex array of facility information.

PageNo.title: Page Number
PageNo.description: The number of pages of results returned

ValueLongDesc.title: Lookup Long Description
ValueLongDesc.example: All phosphorus and phosphate pollutant parameters. Section 3.1.3 of the Technical Users Background Document for the DMR Pollutant Loading Tool describes how the Loading Tool identifies phosphorus parameters and aggregates phosphorus loads.

Category.title: Category
Category.description: A code that uniquely identifies a category of Supplemental Environment Project (SEP) for a settlement (e.g., Assessments and Audits, Environmental Compliance Promotion, Emergency Planning and Preparedness, Environmental Restoration).

Statute.title: Regulatory Statute
Statute.description:
The name of the statute associated with each of the permits and identifiers linked to the facility: 
- CAA = the Clean Air Act
- CWA = the Clean Water Act
- RCRA = the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act
- EP313 = the Emergency Planning and Community Right-to-Know Act, Section 313 (also known as the Toxics Release Inventory Program)
- TSCA = the Toxic Substances Control Act
- SDWA = the Safe Drinking Water Act

Program.title: Program
Program.description: The source database for the EPA programs information.

Status.title: Status
Status.description:
Describes the status of the drinking water violation. Violation statuses include:
- Resolved: The violation has at least one resolving enforcement action. In SDWIS, this indicates that either the system has returned to compliance from the violation, the rule that was violated was no longer applicable, or no further action was needed.
- Archived: The violation is not Resolved, but is more than five years past its compliance period end date. In keeping with the Enforcement Response Policy, the violation no longer contributes to the public water system's overall compliance status. Unresolved violations are also marked as Archived when a system ceases operations (becomes inactive).
- Addressed: The violation is not Resolved or Archived, and is addressed by one or more formal enforcement actions.
- Unaddressed: The violation is not Resolved or Archived, and has not been addressed by formal enforcement.

IndianCountryRows.title: Indian Country Row Count
IndianCountryRows.description: Number of facilities with tribal_flag populated

SVRows.title: Significant Violation Result Count
SVRows.description: Number of facilities with curr_sv_flag populated (CWP_STATUS = "Significant Violation")

CVRows.description: Summary count of the number of CWA facilities or SDWA public drinking water systems with current violations.

V3Rows.description: Number of facilities having one or more quarters in non-compliance (QNC) in the last three years

FEARows.description: Summary count of the number of facilities with a formal enforcement action in the past five years

InfFEARows.description: Number of facilities with infea_5yr_flag populated (INFORMAL_ENF_ACT_COUNT > 0)

INSPRows.description: Number of facilities with insp_5yr_flag populated (CWP_DATE_LAST_INSPECTION)

BadSystemIDs.description: Identifies which passed query system identifiers are invalid.

sdw04.description: Safe Drinking Water Search Results Object

PWSName.title: System Name
PWSName.description: Name of the system regulated under the Safe Drinking Water Act (SDWA)

PWSId.title: Public Water System Identifier
PWSId.description: Unique identifying code for a public water system, consisting of a two-letter state or region code, followed by seven digits

StateCode.title: State Code
StateCode.description: The state in which the system is located.

EPARegion.title: EPA Region
EPARegion.description: The EPA region in which the facility is located

IndianCountry.title: Indian Country
IndianCountry.description: Indicates whether the facility is located in Indian Country

PWSTypeCode.title: System Type
PWSTypeCode.description:
Type of public water system:
- CWS   = Community water system
- NCWS  = Non-community water system
- NTCWS = Non-transient non-community water system
- TNCWS = Transient non-community water system

PWSTypeDesc.title: System Type Description
PWSTypeDesc.description: The type of public water system (PWS) and description of corresponding SystemType code. A public water system is a system for the provision to the public of piped water for human consumption, which has at least 15 service connections or regularly serves a

PrimarySourceCode.title: Primary Source Code
PrimarySourceCode.description:
The source water type:
Surface water (SW) - Water pumped and treated from sources open to the atmosphere, such as rivers, lakes, and reservoirs.
Ground water (GW) - Water pumped and treated from aquifers (natural reservoirs below the earth's surface).
Ground water under direct influence of surface water (GU) - Any water pumped from natural reservoirs below the earth's surface that has been determined to be under the direct influence of surface water.
Purchased (Surface, Ground, Ground UDI Surface) Water - Water purchased from a wholesaler who pumps and treats water.

PrimarySourceDesc.title: Primary Source Description
PrimarySourceDesc.description:
The source water type:
Surface water (SW) - Water pumped and treated from sources open to the atmosphere, such as rivers, lakes, and reservoirs.
Ground water (GW) - Water pumped and treated from aquifers (natural reservoirs below the earth's surface).
Ground water under direct influence of surface water (GU) - Any water pumped from natural reservoirs below the earth's surface that has been determined to be under the direct influence of surface water.
Purchased (Surface, Ground, Ground UDI Surface) Water - Water purchased from a wholesaler who pumps and treats water.

PopulationServedCount.title: Population Served
PopulationServedCount.description: Estimated average daily population served by a system

PWSActivityCode.title: PWS Activity Code
PWSActivityCode.description: Indicates whether systems have an active or inactive designation.

PWSActivityDesc.title: PWS Activity Description
PWSActivityDesc.description: Description of activity status code (ACT), e.g., active, inactive.

OwnerTypeCode.title: Owner Type Code
OwnerTypeCode.description:
Owner/Operator:
- P = Private
- F = Federal Government
- S = State Government
- L = Local Government

QtrsWithVio.title: Quarters with Violation
QtrsWithVio.description: The number of quarters the system was in violation over the past three years. This includes the 12 most recent official quarters and new violations reported after the end of the last official quarter.

QtrsWithSNC.title: Quarters with SNC
QtrsWithSNC.description: The number of quarters the system was designated by EPA as a serious violator over the past 3 years (12 most recent quarters).

SeriousViolator.title: Serious Violator
SeriousViolator.description: Indicates whether system is a Serious Violator (has unresolved serious, multiple, and/or continuing violations that is designated as a priority candidate for formal enforcement)

HealthFlag.title: Health Flag
HealthFlag.description: Indicates whether system has violations of health-based drinking water standards

MrFlag.description: Indicates whether system has monitoring and reporting violations

PnFlag.title: Public Notice Violation Flag
PnFlag.description: Indicates whether system has Public Notice Violations (failure to immediately alert consumers of serious problem with drinking water)

OtherFlag.title: Other Flag
OtherFlag.description: Indicates whether system has other violations, such as failing to issue annual consumer confidence reports or maintain required records

NewVioFlg.title: Has New Violations
NewVioFlg.description: Violations that have been reported to SDWA since end of the last official quarter. These violations are considered draft and do not reflect the official compliance status for the facility.

RulesVio3yr.title: Rules In Violation (past 3 years)
RulesVio3yr.description: The count of rules the system was in violation of over the past three years. This includes the 12 most recent official quarters and new violations reported after the end of the last official quarter.

RulesVio.title: Rules Being Violated
RulesVio.description: The count of rules the system is violating as of the latest official quarter of data in the source system, SDWIS, which may lag by 3-6 months. This includes violations in the most recent official quarter and new violations reported after the end of the last official quarter.

Viopaccr.description: Sum of all violation points for violations reported during the past five years (20 most recent quarters), as of the last quarterly refresh

Vioremain.description: Sum of violation points that were not returned to compliance as of the last quarterly refresh.  Includes points that have received formal enforcement but have not returned to compliance

Viofeanot.description: Sum of violation points accrued during past five years (20 most recent quarters) that are under formal enforcement but not yet returned to compliance, as of the last quarterly refresh

Viortcfea.description: Sum of violation points during past 5 years (20 most recent quarters) that received formal enforcement and returned to compliance, as of the last quarterly refresh

Viortcnofea.description: Sum of violation points during past 5 years (20 most recent quarters) that did not receive formal enforcement but did return to compliance, as of the last quarterly refresh

Ifea.title: Informal Enforcement Actions
Ifea.description: Number of informal enforcement responses during the past 5 years (20 most recent quarters) as of the last quarterly refresh.  Informal enforcement actions do not specify actions and deadlines for returning to compliance.

Feas.title: Formal Enforcement Actions
Feas.description: Number of formal enforcement responses during the past 5 years (20 most recent quarters) as of the last quarterly refresh.  Formal enforcement actions compel a PWS to take specific actions by specific dates to return to compliance.

SDWDateLastIea.title: Date Last Informal Enforcement Action
SDWDateLastIea.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed informal enforcement action taken against the PWS within the last five years.

SDWDateLastIeaEPA.title: Date Last Informal Enforcement Action by EPA
SDWDateLastIeaEPA.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed informal enforcement action taken against the PWS by EPA within the last five years.

SDWDateLastIeaSt.title: Date Last Informal Enforcement Action by State
SDWDateLastIeaSt.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed informal enforcement action taken against the PWS by a state environmental agency within the last five years.

SDWDateLastFea.title: Date Last Formal Enforcement Action
SDWDateLastFea.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed formal enforcement action taken against the PWS within the last five years.

SDWDateLastFeaEPA.title: Date Last Formal Enforcement Action by EPA
SDWDateLastFeaEPA.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed formal enforcement action taken against the PWS by EPA within the last five years.

SDWDateLastFeaSt.title: Date Last Formal Enforcement Action by State
SDWDateLastFeaSt.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed formal enforcement action taken against the PWS by a state environmental agency within the last five years.

SDWAContaminantsInViol3yr.description: The contaminant name and code in violation of a SDWA regulation in the past three years

SDWAContaminantsInCurViol.title: SDWA Contaminants in Current Violation
SDWAContaminantsInCurViol.description: The contaminant name and code (in SDWIS) in violation of a SDWA regulation. This includes violations in the most recent official quarter and new violations that have been reported since the end of the last official quarter.

PbAle.title: Lead Action Level Exceedances (5 years)
PbAle.description: The count of occurrences when 90th percentile sample concentrations of lead exceeded the lead action level of 0.015 mg/L in the past five years.

CuAle.title: Copper Action Level Exceedances (5 years)
CuAle.description: The count of occurrences when 90th percentile sample concentrations of copper exceeded the copper action level of 1.3 mg/L in the past five years.

Rc350Viol.description: The count of open health-based lead violations in the past five years. These include violations of maximum contaminant levels (MCLs), maximum residual disinfectant levels (MRDLs), or treatment technique (TT) rules. This count includes new violations that have been reported since the end of the last official quarter.

DfrUrl.title: DFR URL
DfrUrl.description: The URL to the facility's Detailed Facility Report.

FIPSCodes.description: Five-character Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) value: 2-character state || 3-character county

SNC.title: Compliance Status
SNC.description: Indicates the system's compliance status: No Violation,In Violation, Signficant Noncompliance, or Unknown.

GwSwCode.title: Ground Water/Surface Water Code
GwSwCode.description: Returns "GW" if the systemsource water type is ground water. Returns "SW" if the system source water type is surface water.

SDWA3yrComplQtrsHistory.title: SDWA 3-Year Compliance History
SDWA3yrComplQtrsHistory.description:
The system's 3-year compliance status history by quarter (3-month period). Each character represents a quarter of compliance, going from oldest to most recent. Character values correspond to the following compliance statuses:
_ - No Violation Identified
V - Noncompliance
S - Significant Noncompliance
U - Undetermined

SDWAContaminants.title: SDWA Contaminants
SDWAContaminants.description: All unresolved violation contaminants or violation contaminants that have been resolved in the last 5 years.

PbViol.title: Lead Violation
PbViol.description: The number of lead violations in the last five years.

CuViol.title: Copper Violation
CuViol.description: The number of copper violations in the last five years.

LeadAndCopperViol.title: Lead and Copper Violation
LeadAndCopperViol.description: The number of lead and copper violations.

TRIbalFlag.title: Tribal Lands Flag
TRIbalFlag.description: A flag indicating that the facility is within a tribal area.

FeaFlag.description: Number of formal enforcement responses during the past 5 years (20 most recent quarters) as of the last quarterly refresh.  Formal enforcement actions compel a PWS to take specific actions by specific dates to return to compliance

IeaFlag.title: Informal Enforcement Action Flag
IeaFlag.description: Returns 0 if the system does not have informal enforcement actions in the past five years. Returns 1 if the system does have informal enforcement actions in the past five years.

SNCFlag.title: SNC Flag
SNCFlag.description: Returns 1 if the system is in significant noncompliance (SNC); returns 0 if not.

CurrVioFlag.title: Current Violation Flag
CurrVioFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has a current violation. 1 = Yes

VioFlag.title: Violation Flag
VioFlag.description: Indicates whether the system has been in violation in the past five years (1 if yes, 0 if no).

Insp5yrFlag.title: Inspected Within Last Five Years Flag
Insp5yrFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has an inspection within the last 5 years. 1 = Yes

Sansurvey5yr.title: Sanitary Surveys (5 years)
Sansurvey5yr.description: The number of sanitary surveys completed within the past five years. A sanitary survey is an on-site review of a system's water source, facilities, equipment, operation, and maintenance, intended to point out sanitary deficiencies and assess the system's capability to supply safe drinking water.

SignificantDeficiencyCount.title: Significant Deficiency Count
SignificantDeficiencyCount.description: The number of significant deficiencies found from a sanitary survey within the past five years.

SDWDateLastVisit.title: Date Last Visit
SDWDateLastVisit.description: The date of the last system visit.

SDWDateLastVisitEPA.title: Date Last Visit by EPA
SDWDateLastVisitEPA.description: The date of the last system visit by EPA.

SDWDateLastVisitState.title: Date Last Visit by State
SDWDateLastVisitState.description: The date of the last system visit by a state agency.

SDWDateLastVisitLocal.title: Date Last Visit by Local
SDWDateLastVisitLocal.description: The date of the last system visit by a local agency.

MaxScore.title: Max Score
MaxScore.description: A sorting score for internal use.

RegistryID.title: FRS ID
RegistryID.description: An internal 12-digit Facility Registry Service (FRS) tracking number used to tie all facility data together in EPA regulatory program databases.
